Question: kwnyy
Answer: kwnyy mwbail aur daysk tap wyb ayply kyshnza ki tamyr ka ayk plyt farm haay۔yha ayk mft aur awpn swrs snghl pyj wyb ayplykyshn frym wrk hay js ki srbrahay ghwghl main kwnyy tym aur afrad aur karpwryshn 1 ki ayk jmaat kay zaryaha haay۔kwnyy isi tym ki taraf sy ayk mkml dwbarha lkhna hay js nay anghwlr jay ays 1 ko bnaya tha۔kwnyy ki kuch aham khsawsayat main shaml hayn: taip askrpt: kwnyy ayk taip askrpt par mbny frym wrk 1 haay۔: kwnyy kay pas ayk mkhtlf azahaar ka nhaw hawta hay ، jo praprty baindangh kay liye "[]" par twjha mrkwza krta hay ، aur "()" aywnt baindangh 1.nghwlr dawylprza ko tyzay sy brkrar rkhnay waly ، twsya pzayr ayp 2 ko trtyb denay main mdd kay liye bldangh blaks mhaya krta haay۔yha kras plyt farm hay ، tyza ، twsya pzayr ، nakabl ykyn twlngh rkhta hay ، aur isy lakhwn psnd haay۔kwnyy sy ayl aai ayk kmanda lain antrfys twl hay jsay dawylprza kwnyy ayply kyshnza ko shrwa karnay ، tyar karnay ، shaarwn aur brkrar rkhnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: kwnyy kya hay aur is ki klydy khsawsayat kya hayn؟
Answer: kwnywlr ayk dawylpmnt plyt farm hay jo taip askrpt par bnaya gaya hay jo dawylprza ko tyzay sy brkrar rkhnay waly ، twsya pzayr ayp ko tyzay sy trtyb denay main mdd kay liye bldangh blaks mhaya krta haay۔as ki kuch aham khsawsayat main shaml hayn: jzaw par mbny frym wrk: kwnywlr ajzaaa kay ayk drjha bndy ko "askwp" ya kntrwlrza ki bjaiay apni bnyady tamyraty khsawsayt kay tawr par astamal krta haay۔afadyt main hr shmarha ayk zamray ki wzuahat krta hay js main afadyt ko akl aur aadad wa shmar mwjwd hayn۔ayk chyza aam tawr par shkhsa antrfys (UI) kay ayk hasaay ki wzuahat krty haay۔ 1. madalryty: bohat zayada bnyady faalyt madaywlza 2 main mntkl hogi haay۔ taip askrpt: kwnyy ayk taip askrpt par mbny frym wrk 2 haay۔ kras-plyt farm spwrt: kwnyy mkhtlf plyt farmza kay liye wyb ayply kyshnza tshkyl dy sakta hay ، bshmwl bhi shaml hay ، bshmwl mkhtlf plyt farmza kay liye wyb ayply kyshnza tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔mwbail daywaisza aur daysk taps 13۔ wkt (aay aw ty) talyf ka tay .n: kwnyy aay aw ty talyf ka astamal krta hay ، jo jawa askrpt failwn kay saiza ko kam krkay aur bwjh taimza 1 ko braha kar karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔ anhasaar anjykshn: ayplykyshn ki tamyraty nshwwnma ko aasan bnata haay۔dawylprza 3. enchanced karkrdghy kay liay: kwnyy wkt sy pehlay (AOT) talyf ka astamal krta hay ، jo jawa askrpt failwn kay saiza ko kam krkay aur bwjh taimza 1 ko braha kar karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta haay۔ mytryl dayzaain kay ajzaaa: kwnywlr kwnywlr 4. awwrl kay liye jzaw anfrastrkchr aur mady dayzaain kay ajzaaa fraham karty hayn۔kwnywlr isi tym ki taraf sy ayk mkml dwbarha lkhna hay js nay anghwlr jay ays bnaya hay ، aur yeh ghwghl main kwnyy tym ki srbrahay main aur afrad aur karpwryshnwn ki ayk jmaat kay zaryaha ayk mft aur awpn swrs snghl safhaha wyb ayply kyshn frym wrk haay۔

Question: kwnyy main ngmodule aur jzaw main kya frk haay؟
Answer: kwnyy main ، ngmodule aur jzaw do mkhtlf tsawrat hayn۔ayk ayn jy mwdawl kwda kay ayk hum aahanghy blak kay liye ayk kntynr hay jo kesi ayply kyshn dawmyn ، wrk flw ، ya salahaytwn sy mtalk ayk kryb sy mtalk syt kay liye wkf haay۔yha ayk aysy tknyk hay jo kwnyywlr 2 main dahylay dahylay lekin anthaaiy mrbwta nzaam ki tamyr kay liye astamal hawty haay۔ayk ayn jy mwdawl ajzaaa ، khdmat ، hadayat aur paipwn ka ayk mjmwaha hay js ka kryb sy talk hay aur is ka mtalb ayk sath astamal hona haay۔har kwnyy ayply kyshn main kam aza kam ayk ayn jy mwdawl hona zurwry hay ، jo rwt madaywl 2 haay۔rwt ayn jy mwdawl kwnyy ayplykyshn ko bwtstryp karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur yeh is jra kay madaywl main hay keh hum jra ki staha kay jzaw 2 ko bhi bwtstryp karty hayn۔ dusri taraf ، ayk jza ko kwnyy ka ayk bnyady blak hay ، aur mtadd ajzaaa ayk ayply kyshn 4 bnatay hayn۔ayk jzaw ayk tymplyt 1 kay sath hadayt haay۔yha kwnyy ayply kyshn ka ayk bldangh blak hay ، aur yeh ywzar antrfys (UI) 5 kay ayk hasaay ki wzuahat krta haay۔ayk ajzaaa kesi nzaaray ko pysh karnay kay liye zamha dar hawta hay ، jo askryn ka ayk hasaha hay jo ayply kyshn kay madal 1۔mry main dayta dkhata haay۔jw saarf antrfys kay ayk hasaay ki wzuahat krta hay

Question: aap kwnyy sy ayl aai ka astamal karty hoey nya kwnyy prwjykt kesay bnatay hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy sy ayl aai ka astamal karty hoey ayk nya kwnyy prwjykt bnanay kay l you ، aap un mrahal par aml krsktay hayn: mndrjha zayl kmanda ka astamal karty hoey apnay sstm par aalmy staha par kwnyy sy ayl aai anstal kryn: ayn py aym anstal karain -jy @kwnywlr/klwpyn ayk trmynl ya kmanda prampt aur jahan aap chahti hain is daairyktry main jien jahan aap chahti hayn۔apna nya kwnyy prwjykt bnaiyn۔ ayk nya kwnyy prwjykt bnanay kay liye mndrjha zayl kmanda ki tshkyl kryn: ayn jy nyw prwjykt-namha plys "prwjykt nam" js nam kay sath aap apnay prwjykt ko dena chahti hayn۔kwnyy sy ayl aai aap ko apnay prwjykt kay liye kuch akhtyarat ka antkhab karnay ka asharha kray gi ، jesay rwtngh ka astamal karna hay ، kon sa astail shyt farmyt astamal karna hay ، aur skht wzua ko kabl bnana hay ya nhayn۔aap un akhtyarat ka antkhab krsktay hain jo aap ki zurwryat kay mtaabk hon ya pehlay sy taay shuda aapshnza ko kbwl karnay kay liye ENTER dbaiyn۔ jab prwjykt tyar kya jata hay ، mndrjha zayl kmanda ka astamal karty hoey prwjykt daairktry par jaiyn: sy day prwjykt-nam fainl ، dawylpmnt srwr shrwa karnay kay liye drj zayl kmanda ko chlaiyn awrapnay niay kwnyy prwjykt ko wyb braؤzar main khwlyn: ayn jy srw -awpyntys aap kay prwjykt ko mrtb kray gi aur isy HTTP: // lwkl hawst: 4200/. nwt main ayk niay braؤzar wndaw main khwlay ghy: un akdamat ka khlasaha mndrjha zayl zaraia sy kya gaya haay: 123.1tektutorialshub2dotnettututututurials3github

Question: kwnyy jzaw laif saiykl haks ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: kwnyy jzaw laif saiykl haks aysay tarykay hain jo kesi jzaw kay laif saiykl main mkhsawsa lmhaat main kwnyy kay zaryaha pkartay hayn۔yha haks klydy zandghy kay lmhaat aur 1 kay wkt kam karnay ki salahayt main mriyt fraham karty hayn۔an haks ko nafza karnay sy ، dawylprza kesi jzaw kay laif saiykl main typ krsktay hain aur is kay laif saiykl kay mkhtlf mrahal par mkhsawsa aamal anjam dy saktay hayn۔yhaan mkhtlf kwnyy jzaw laif saiykl haks hayn: nghwnchynjs: is hak ko is wkt kaha jata hay jab kesi jzaw ki koi dayta pabnd jaiydad tbdyl hawty haay۔as ko ayk sadghy sy chlnay wali shay mlty hay js main tbdyl shuda praprty 2 ki pchhly aur mwjwdha akdar par mushtamil hawta haay۔as ka astamal jzaw ki khsawsayat ko shrwa karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔yha un tbdylywn ka ptha lghanay aur is par aml karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh kwnyy khud bkhwd ptha nahin lghata haay۔yha abtdaa anjam denay kay liye astamal hawta hay js kay liye jzaw kay mwad 1 tak rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔as ka astamal mwad ki janch pratal kay bad azuafy janch pratal aur karrwaiy karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔yha abtdaa anjam denay kay liye astamal hawta hay js kay liye ajzaaa kay nzaaray 1 tak rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔as nzaaray ki janch pratal kay bad azuafy janch pratal aur karrwaiy karnay kay liye is ka astamal kya jata haay۔as ka astamal safaiy kay kamwn ko anjam denay kay liye kya jata hay ، jesay mshahadha karnay walon sy un sbskraib karna aur aywnt kay hayndalrza ko alag krna۔ js aardar main un haks ko kaha jata hay woh taay shuda aur pysh ghwiy ki jaskty hay ، aur yeh zurwry hay keh haks ko mؤsar tarykay sy astamal karnay kay liye is aardar ko smjhna zurwry haay۔

Question: kwnyy jzaw main tymplyt yw aar ayl aur astail yw aar ayl ki khsawsayat ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kwnyy main ، tymplyt yw aar ayl aur astail yw aar ayl ki khsawsayat ko kesi jzaw main astamal kya jata hay takha is jzaw kay liye HTML tymplyt aur sy ays ays astail shyt kay mkam ki wzuahat ki jaskay ، baltrtyb 12۔yhaan hr praprty ki ayk mkhtsar wzuahat haay: tymplyt yw aar ayl: is praprty ko jzaw kay liye aych ty aym ayl tymplyt fail kay mkam ki wzuahat karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔tymplyt ki wzuahat ya tou jzaw myta dayta main ya kesi byrwny fail main tymplyt yw aar ayl praprty 12 ka astamal karty hoey ki jaskty haay۔aghr tymplyt ko byrwny fail main byan kya gaya hay tou ، tymplyt yw aar ayl praprty ko is fail 12 ki raha ki wzuahat kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ astail yw aar ayl: is praprty ko jzaw kay liye ayk ya zayada sy ays ays astail shyt kay mkam ki wzuahat karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aslwb ki taryf ya tou jzaw myta dayta main ya kesi byrwny fail main astail yw aar ayl ays praprty 12 ka astamal karty hoey ki jaskty haay۔aghr aslwb ko byrwny fail main byan kya gaya hay tou ، astail yw aar ayl ays praprty ko is fail 12 ki raha ki wzuahat karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ un khsawsayat ka astamal karty hoey ، dawylprza kesi jzaw ki pysh ksh ki mntak ko apnay karwbary mntak sy alag krsktay hain ، js sy brkrar rkhnay aur dwbarha astamal karnay main aasany hawty haay۔ayply kyshn 3 kay mkhtlf hasawn main jzaw۔mzayd braan ، tymplyts aur astail shyts kay liye byrwny failwn ka astamal kwda bys 3 ki bhatr tnzaym aur antzaam ki ajazat dyta haay۔

Question: aap kwnyy main saarf kay un pt ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy main ، saarf kay un pt ko snbhalnay kay mkhtlf tarykay hayn۔kwnyy main saarf kay un pt ko snbhalnay kay kuch tarykay yeh hayn: aywnt baindanghza: kwnyy aywnt baindanghza ko saarf kay un pt kay zaryaha mthark kesi bhi dawm aywnt ka jwab denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha saarfyn 12 sy un pt haasal karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، hum btn klks ko mndrjha zayl kay tawr par sn saktay hayn: <btn (klk kryn) = "aan btn klyk ()"> mujhey klk karain </btn> yeh kwda btn klyk () kay tarykha kar ko btn kay upar par klk krta haay۔baindangh: do tarfha dayta baindangh jzaw aur nzaaray kay mabyn dayta ko hum aahangh karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh nzaryha main ki janay wali tbdylyan khud bkhwd jzaw main zaahar hawty hain ، aur is kay braks 3۔farmwn main saarf kay un pt ko snbhalnay kay liye do tarfha dayta baindangh ka astamal kya jaskta hay ، jesay un pt fyldaza aur chyk baksza۔ tymplyt sy chlnay wali shklyn: kwnyy farm kay zaryaha saarf kay un pt ko snbhalnay kay liye tymplyt sy chlnay wala nktaha nzar fraham krta haay۔yha nktaha nzar un pt fyldaza ko jzaw main khsawsayat sy bandhnay kay liye hadaytwn ka astamal krta hay ، aur yeh farm aur is ki twsayk kay liye kwnyy par anhasaar krta haay۔yha nktaha nzar farm ki haalt ko snbhalnay kay liye ayk rd aml prwghramngh madal ka astamal krta hay ، aur is sy farm ki twsayk aur jma kranay kay aml par zayada amdha kntrwl ki ajazat mlty haay۔baindangh ، tymplyt sy chlnay wali shklyn ، aur rd aml ki shklyn۔dawylprza is nktaha nzar ka antkhab krsktay hain jo un ki zurwryat aur un ki drkhwast ki zurwryat kay mtaabk bhatryn haay۔

Question: kwnyy rwtngh kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh ayk aysy khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko is bat ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyty hay keh kis tarah saarfyn rwts 12 ka astamal krkay kesi ayply kyshn kay zaryaay tshryf la jatay hayn۔rwtngh aap ko URL1 par mnhasar hay keh aap ko apni drkhwast kay mkhsawsa nzaaray zaahar karnay dyta haay۔jb saarf ayk rastay sy dusray rastay par jata hay tou ، kwnyy rwtr yw aar ayl kay rastay ko mtalkha jzaw ki taraf nksh krta hay aur is ka nzaarha 3 dkhata haay۔yha hay keh kwnyy rwtngh kis tarah kam krty haay: rastwn ki wzuahat: kwnyy ayply kyshn main rastwn ki wzuahat karnay kay liye ، dawylprza rwtr madal aur rwts madaywl astamal karty hayn۔rwtr madal rwtngh kay l necessary zurwry khdmt fraham karnay waly aur hadayat mhaya krta hay ، jabky rwts madaywl rastwn ki khud 144 ki wzuahat krta haay۔. rastwn kay mabyn nywyghytngh: rastwn kay mabyn tshryf la janay kay liye ، dawylprza HTML tymplyt main rwtr lnk lnk hadayt ya jzaw kwda main rwtr srws ka astamal krsktay hayn۔rwtr lnk lnk hadayt ayk haaipr lnk bnata hay jsay ، jab klk kya jata hay tou ، mkhsawsa rastay par tshryf la jata haay۔raؤtr srws prwghram main nywyghyt karnay kay tarykay mhaya krty hay ، jesay nywyghyt () aur nywyghyt baiwrl () 15. raؤt ghardaza: kwnywlr rwt gharda bhi mhaya krta hay ، jo ghair mjaza rsaiy sy rastwn ko bchanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔rwt ghardaza ko yeh chyk karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay keh aya kesi saarf ki twsayk ki hogi hay ، agar un kay pas zurwry ajazat hay ، ya agar inhain kesi mkhsawsa rwt 6 tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat haay۔ khlasaha main ، kwnyy rwtngh ayk taaktwr khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko is bat ki wzuahat karnay ki ajazat dyty hay keh saarfyn aay ayn kay zaryaay kis tarah tshryf la jatay hayn۔URL par mnhasar hay keh drkhwast aur dasplay kryn۔rastwn ka astamal krkay ، dawylprza ayk zayada mnzam aur sakhty ayply kyshn tshkyl dy saktay hain jo brkrar rkhnay aur pymanay main aasan haay۔

Question: kwnyy main anhasaar anjykshn kya hay aur yeh kyon zurwry haay؟
Answer: anhasaar anjykshn ayk dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo kwnyy main astamal hawta hay jo ajzaaa ، khdmat aur madaywlza ko bahamy anhasaar karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jabky ayply kyshn 12 main anjkshn lghaiay janay waly byrwny anhasaar par mstkl mzaajy ko brkrar rkhtay hayn۔anhasaar anjykshn ashyaa ko fraham karnay ka ayk tarykha hay js ki klas ko (as ki anhasaar) kam 3 karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ksy klas kay andr ashyaa bnanay kay bjaiay ، ashyaa ko kesi byrwny makhza sy klas main mntkl kya jata hay ، jo kwda ko madaywlr aur tyst 14 main aasan bna dyta haay۔yhaan kuch wjwhaat hain keh anhasaar anjykshn kwnyy main aham haay: madaywlryty: anhasaar anjykshn khdshat ko alag krkay aur ajzaaa kay mabyn jwraay ko kam krkay madaywlr aur dwbarha kabl astamal kwda bnana aasan bnata haay۔mzaak ya anhasaar ko tyst dablza 14 kay sath tbdyl kryn۔dawylprza ko kwda ko tbdyl kyay baghair anhasaar ko shaml karnay ya khtm karnay kay liye jo un ka astamal karty hayn۔1dotnettricks2freecodecamp3agular4agular- ywnywrsty

Question: aap kwnyy main ajzaaa kay mabyn kesay bat chyt karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy main ajzaaa kay mabyn bat chyt karnay kay bohat sary tarykay hain ، bshmwl: un pt aur aaؤt pt baindangh: ajzaaa un pt aur aaؤt pt baindangh ka astamal krkay ayk dusray kay sath bat chyt krsktay hayn۔@an pt () daykwrytr ko waldyn kay jzaw sy bchwn kay jzaw main dayta mntkl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky @aaؤt pt () daykwrytr ko bchwn kay jzaw sy waldyn kay jzaw sy la kar aywiywchaida aur bad kay nzaaray tak phanchanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay: ajzaaa hr ayk kay sath bat chyt krsktay hayndwsray wywchaida aur bad kay nzaaray ka astamal karty hawiay۔bchwn kay jzaw ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye wywdaaida ka astamal kya jata hay ، jabky bchwn kay ajzaaa kay nzaaray ko shrwa karnay kay bad aml karnay kay liye bad ki nzar ka astamal kya jata haay۔khdmat ka astamal un ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta aur faalyt ko bantnay kay liye kya jata hay jn ka braha rast talk nahin hawta haay۔anhasaar anjykshn 32 ka astamal karty hoey khdmat ko ajzaaa main anjkshn lghaya jaskta haay۔aywnt ka astamal bchwn kay jzaw sy waldyn kay jzaw tak wakaat ko kharj karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky mshahadat ko ashaat sbskraib pytrn 41 kay astamal sy ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta shyir karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔awr bad kay nzaaray ، khdmat ، aur aywnt myttr aur mshahadha karnay walay۔dawylprza is nktaha nzar ka antkhab krsktay hain jo un ki zurwryat aur un ki drkhwast ki zurwryat kay mtaabk bhatryn haay۔

Question: kwnyy main nghmwdal hadayt ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kwnyy main NGMODEL hadayt namha kntrwl ansar aur dawmyn madal kay mabyn do tarfha dayta baindangh bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔yha ayk un blt hadayt hay jo dawmyn madal sy farm kntrwl msaal tyar krty hay aur isy farm kntrwl ansar 1 sy bandh dyty haay۔NGMODEL hadayt HTML kntrwlza (an pt ، mntkhb ، tykstyrya) ki kymt ko drkhwast 1 sy mnslk krty haay۔NGModel hadayt namha kesi dawmyn madal sy farmkntrwl msaal bnanay aur isy farm kntrwl ansar 1 sy bandhnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔NGModel hadayt ko kntrwl ki kdr aur twsayk ki haysayt sy bakhbr rkhnay aur madal 1 kay sath nzaryha mtaabkt pzayr rkhnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔NGModel hadayt namha ko waldyn kay farm 1 main bchwn kay kntrwl kay farm kay tawr par rjstr karnay kay liye bhi astamal kya jata haay۔ayn jy mwdal hadayt ko un pt ، mntkhb ، aur tykstyrya anasar 1 kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔NGModel hadayt ko kstm hadaytwn ka astamal karty hoey apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnaya jaskta hay jo NGModelController kay twsta sy NGModel ki kdr main trmym karty hayn۔mjmway tawr par ، aynghwldayl hadayt kwnyy ki ayk aham khsawsayt hay jo farm kntrwl anasar aur dawmyn madalza kay mabyn do tarfha dayta baindangh ki ajazat dyty haay۔

Question: kwnywlr main nzaryaty aur nzaryha kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: kwnyy main nzar aanay wali khsawsayt kwnyy ajzaaa kay l template tymplyt aur astail anpswlyshn kay akhtyarat ki wzuahat karnay kay liye tyn mkhtlf tarykwn ko fraham krta haay۔tynwn tarykwn main nzaryha haay۔yhaan nzaryha kay darmiyan akhtlafat hayn۔shydaw dawm api2.viewencapsulation.emulated: kya pehlay sy taay shuda mwda 34 haay۔ ajzaaa CSS shylywn kay liye aur ankpswlyshn 54 ko haasal karnay kay liye mark ap kay liye mnfrd HTML safat shaml karty hayn۔ajzaaa kay aslwb 34. kwnywlr ankpswlyshn ko aymwlyt krta hay ، lhazaa is ka nam aymwlytda 56.1 smry main ، nzaryha dawm kay sath apni mrzuy kay mtaabk anasar tkhlyk krta hay ، jabky nzaryaty۔nzaryha kypswlyshn.nywytngh hakyky ankpswlyshn mhaya krty hay ، jabky wywynsypwlyshn.mwlytda ankpswlyshn ۔1 astyk awwr flw 2 thwrstn-hans 3 aysnypyts 4 kwdayk raft 5 tytwrylshwb 6 mydaym

Question: kwnyy main kesi saf par tkrar karnay kay liye aap NGFOR ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer:
kwnyy main ayk saf par tkrar karnay kay l we ، hum NGFOR hadayt astamal krsktay hayn۔ayn jy ayf aar ko astamal karnay kay akdamat yeh hayn: ajzaaa ki klas main ، ajzaaa kay sanchay main aaitmza ki ayk saf ki wzuahat kryn۔ ajzaaa kay sanchay main ، ayn jyfwr hadayt ko sray par lwp karnay aur hr aaitm ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kryn۔ ayn jy ayf aw aar ka bnyady trkyb mndrjha zayl haay۔
{{aaitm}}
yahan ، aaitmza aaitmza ki saf hay jo tkrar karnay kay liye hay ، aur aaitm ayk mtghyr nam hay jo saf main hr shay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ hum bhi kar saktay hayn۔andayks ki wrda ka astamal krkay srny main mwjwdha aaitm ka andayks astamal kryn:
{{i}} - {{aaitm}}
yahan ، ikya srny main mwjwdha aaitm ka asharyha haay۔ hum NGFOR ko bhi ashyaa ki ayk saf par lwp karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn:
{{shkhsa}}}} - {{shkhsa.j}}
yahan ، lwgh tkrar karnay kay liye ashyaa ki saf hay ، aur shkhsa mtghyr nam hay jo saf main hr shay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ khlasaha main ، NGFOR hadayt ko kwnyy main ayk saf kay upar tkrar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔yha jzaw tymplyt main dayta ko zaahar karnay ka ayk aasan aur taaktwr tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Question: kwnyy main wakaha ki klas ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kwnyy main wakaha ki klas ka astamal kstm aywnts ko hum aahanghy ya snjydghy sy kharj karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur kesi msaal 12 ko sbskraib krkay un wakaat kay liye hayndalrza ko rjstr karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔aywntymytr klas kstm aywnt 1 ko kharj karnay ki @aaؤt pt hadayt kay sath ajzaaa main astamal hawty haay۔@aaؤt pt daykwrytr ko aaؤt pt praprty ki wzuahat kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo kesi wakaay ko kharj krta hay jab is ki kymt 3 bdl jati haay۔aywnt mytr klas aywnt ko brahanay kay liye zamha dar hay ، jabky @aaؤt pt praprty aam tawr par taip aywnt mytr 3 ki hawty haay۔chailda jzaw aywnt ko brahanay kay liye aywnt mytr klas kay aymt tarykha ka astamal kray ga ، aur waldyn ka jzaw aai ty 3 ko sbskraib krkay aywnt ko sn la gha۔aywntymtr klas mshahadha karnay waly tabkay par mbny hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh is ka astamal dayta 2 kay slslay ko bnanay aur un ka nzam karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔aywntymytr klas kwnyy ki ayk taaktwr khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk wakaat pyda karnay aur ajzaaa kay mabyn lchkdar aur mwsar andaza main bat chyt karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔

Question: aap kwnywlr main @wywchlda ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy main @wywchaida ko astamal karnay kay liye ، un mrahal par aml kryn: ' @kwnyy/kwr' laibryry sy wywchaida daykwrytr ko draamd kryn۔ waldyn kay jzaw main kesi bchay kay jzaw ya ansar ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye wywchaida daykwrytr ka astamal kryn۔ @wywdaaida ka bnyady trkybmndrjha zayl haay:@wywchailda ('chaildakympynt') chailda kampynt ryf: chailda kampyntryf: chailda kmpwynt yahan bchwn kay ajzaaa ya ansar ka nam hay ، aur chailda kmpwynt bchay kay jzaw ki ksm haay۔ hum jamd prchm ko kntrwl karnay kay liye bhi astamal krsktay hain jab is par kabw panay kay liye jamd prchm bhi astamal kya jaskta haay۔wyw kay astfsar par amldraamd kya gaya haay:@wywchailda ('chaildakmpynt' ، {jamd: ghlta}) chailda kampynt ryf: chailda kampynt ryf: chailda kampynt ryf: yahan ، msthakm: ghalat mtalb yeh hay keh nzaaray ko shrwa karnay kay bad nzaryha astfsar aml main laya jata haay۔ hum prahnay kay jhndaay ko bhi astamal krsktay hayn۔bchay kay jzaw sy prahnay kay liye ayk mkhtlf twkn ki wzuahat kryn: @wywchailda ('chaildakmpynt' ، {prahyn: ansar ryf}) chaildaylymntryf: aylymyntryf ؛ yahan ، ansar ryf bchay kay jzaw sy prahnay kay liye twkn haay۔waldyn kay jzaw main bchwn kay jzaw ya ansar ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔yha waldyn kay jzaw main bchwn kay ajzaaa aur anasar tak rsaiy aur un main hayra phyry karnay ka ayk aasan aur taaktwr tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Question: kwnyy main NGCLASS hadayt ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kwnyy main NGCLASS hadayt namha kuch shraita 12 par mbny HTML ansar par CSS klaswn ko shaml karnay ya hatanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ayn jy sy ayl aay ays ki hadayt kwnyy ka tarykha hay keh aap ko apnay kwnyy jza 1 main kya ho raha hay is ki bnyad par aap ko mkhtlf klaswn aur aslwb ko astamal karnay ki ajazat di jaiay۔ayn jy sy ayl aay ays sy hadayt namha ko ayk HTML ansar par sy ays ays klaswn ko mthark tawr par ayk aysay azahaar kay zaryaha astamal kya jata hay js main tamam tabkat ko shaml karnay ki nmaindghy ki jati haay۔ayn jy sy ayl aay ays sy hadayt tyn ksm kay azahaar "rytrn wylywza" ki hamayt krty haay: strngh ، srny ، aur aabjykt 2۔ayn jy sy ayl aay ays sy hadayt ko kuch shraita ki bnyad par klaswn ka atalak karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jo mthark aur zamha dar saarf antrfys 12 bnanay kay l useful mfyd bnata haay۔pychydha aur mthark UIS12 bnanay kay liye NGCLASS hadayt aksar dyghr hadayat ، jesay NGIF aur NGSWitch kay sath mil kar astamal ki jati haay۔mjmway tawr par ، ayn jy sy ayl aay ays ki hadayt kwnyy ki ayk aham khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko kuch shraita ki bnyad par sy ays ays klaswn ko shaml karnay ya isy hatanay ki ajazat dyty hay ، js sy mthark aur zamha dar saarf antrfys bnana aasan hawjata haay۔

Question: aap kwnyy main waldyn aur bchwn kay ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta kesay ghzartay hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy main waldyn aur bchwn kay ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta ko mntkl karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl tarykwn ko astamal krsktay hayn: @an pt () daykwrytr: @an pt () daykwrytr waldyn kay jzaw sy dayta ko kesi bchay kay jzaw main mntkl karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔@an pt () daykwrytr bchay kay jzaw main kesi praprty ki wzuahat kay liye astamal hawta hay jo is ki kymt waldyn kay ajzaaa 12 sy haasal krskta haay۔waldyn kay jzaw ka jzaw۔@aaؤt pt () daykwrytr bchay kay jzaw main kesi wakaay ki wzuahat kay liye astamal hawta hay jo waldyn kay jzaw main dayta kharj krskta haay۔aywnt mytrtr ko mtalwbha dayta 34 kay sath aywnt ko kharj karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ wywchaida: wywdaaida ko waldyn kay jzaw main bchwn kay jzaw ya ansar ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as kay bad waldyn ka jzaw bchwn kay ajzaaa ki khsawsayat aur tarykwn tak rsaiy haasal krskta hay takha un kay darmiyan dayta ko pas kya jaskay۔ khdmt: khdmat ka astamal un ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta ko bantnay kay liye kya jaskta hay jn ka braha rast talk nahin haay۔waldyn ka jzaw khdmt ko anjykshn laga sakta hay aur is ko bchwn kay ajzaaa 36.mry main dayta ko mntkl karnay kay liye astamal krskta hay ، is main kwnyy main waldyn aur bchwn kay ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta pas karnay kay bohat sary tarykay hain ، bshmwl @an pt () daykwrytr ، @aaؤt pt () daykwrytr aur aywnt myttr، wywchaida ، aur khdmat۔dawylprza is nktaha nzar ka antkhab krsktay hain jo un ki zurwryat aur un ki drkhwast ki zurwryat kay mtaabk bhatryn haay۔

Question: kwnyy main nghwnyt aur nghftr wywnait kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: nghwnyt aur aynghftr wywnait kwnyywl main laif saiykl haks hain jo kesi jzaw kay laif saiykl main mkhsawsa mkamat par kuch kam anjam denay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔yhaan nghwnynt aur nghftr wywnait kay mabyn akhtlafat hayn: nghwnynt: nghwnynyt ayk laif saiykl hak hay jsay kwnyy kay bad kaha jata hay keh is nay kesi jzaw ki tamam dayta sy mnslk khsawsayat ko shrwa kya haay۔as ko sirf ayk bar kaha jata hay jab jzaw pehlay pyda hawta haay۔ngoninit abtda kay kamwn ko anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jesay srwr sy dayta bazayaft karna ya mtghyrat ko shrwa krna۔as nzaaray ko shrwa karnay kay bad isy sirf ayk bar kaha jata haay۔NGAFterViewInit un kamwn ko anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jata hay js kay nzaaray tak rsaiy ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jesay DOM main jwra twra karna ya bchwn kay ajzaaa tak rsaiy haasal krna۔ayk jzaw kay nzaryha aur is kay bchwn kay nzaaray ko shrwa kya۔dawylprza un laif saiykl haks ko abtdaiy kamwn ko anjam denay aur nzaaray ya bchwn kay ajzaaa main hayra phyry karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap kwnyy main paip kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy main paipwn ko tymplyt main dayta ko tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔kwnyy main paipwn ko astamal karnay kay akdamat yeh hayn: woh paip draamd karain jo aap '@kwnyy/kwr' laibryry sy astamal karna chahti hayn۔ paip ko jzaw ya madaywl main bnaiyn jahan aap isy astamal karna chahti hayn۔ shaml krkay tymplyt main paip ko astamal kryn۔yha paip aaprytr '|' ka astamal karty hoey ayk azahaar kay liay۔ paip astamal karnay ka bnyady nhaw mndrjha zayl haay: {{kdr |paip nam}} yahan ، kdr ko tbdyl karnay kay liye aadad wa shmar hay ، aur paip nam astamal karnay kay liye paip ka nam haay۔ hum paip kay nam kay bad un ko shaml krkay pyramytrza ko bhi paip main mntkl krsktay hayn: {{kdr |paip nam: pyrm 1: pyram 2}} yahan ، pyram 1 aur pyram 2 paip ko mntkl karnay kay pyramytrza hain ۔nghwlr kiy blt un paip mhaya krta hay ، jesay dayt paip ، apr kysypaip ، lwirkysypaip ، krnsypaip ، fysad paip ، aur jay ays aw ayn paip۔ham ayk khasa tarykay sy dayta ko tbdyl karnay kay liye kstm paip bhi tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، kwnyy main paipwn ko tymplyt main dayta ko tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔wha jzaw tymplyt main dayta ko farmyt aur jwra twra karnay ka ayk aasan aur taaktwr tarykha fraham karty hayn۔dawylpr mtadd blt un paipwn main sy antkhab krsktay hain ya apni zurwryat kay mtaabk kstm paip tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔

Question: kwnyy main nghwnchynjza aur ayn jy dawchyk main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ngonchanges aur ngdocheck kwnywlr main laif saiykl haks hain jo jzaw main tbdylywn ka ptha lghanay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔yhaan nghwnchynjza aur ayn jy dawkyk kay mabyn akhtlafat hayn: nghwnchynjs: nghwnchynjs ayk laif saiykl hak hay jsay kehty hain jab kesi jzaw ki un pt praprty ki kymt tbdyl hawty haay۔as ko nghwnait sy pehlay aur sirf is wkt kaha jata hay jab un pt praprty 12 main tbdyl hawjaty haay۔ghwnchnghs ko aysay kam anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jn ko karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay jab un pt praprty main tbdyly aaty hay ، jesay niay wylyw 1 par mbny nzaaray ko ap dayt karna ya hasab ktab krna۔asay nghwnchynjza aur nghwnynt kay bad kaha jata hay aur ajzaaa 12 kay laif saiykl kay doran mtadd bar kaha jaskta haay۔ayn jy dawchyk ko un kamwn ko anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jn ko karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay jab jzaw ki haalt tbdyl hawty hay ، jesay mwjwdha astyt 1۔mry main nzaarha ko ap dayt karna ya hasab ktab krna۔ khlasaha main ، nghwnchynjza ko kaha jata hay jab un pt praprty ki kymt tbdyl hawty hay ، jabky ayn jy dawchyk ko blaya jata haay۔jb bhi jzaw main tbdylywn kay liye kwnyy chyk krta haay۔dawylpr un laif saiykl haks ko aysay kam anjam denay kay l use astamal krsktay hain jn ko karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay jab jzaw ki ryast tbdyl hawty hay ya jab un pt praprty tbdyl hawty haay۔

Question: aap kwnyy main kstm ki twsayk karnay wala kesay bnatay hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy main kstm ki twsayk knndha bnanay kay l we ، hum un akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: '@kwnyy/farm' laibryry sy wylywytr ayf ayn aur khlasaha kntrwl klas draamd kryn۔ ayk fnkshn ki wzuahat karain jo ayk khlasaha kntrwl aabjykt ko dlyl kay tawr par lyta hay aur ya tou kaladm hawta hay agar kntrwl drst hay tou kntrwl drst haay۔ya kesi ghltay kay pygham kay sath koi shay agar kntrwl ghalat haay۔ kesi kstm ki twsayk karnay waly fnkshn ka bnyady nhaw mndrjha zayl haay: fnkshn kstm wylydaytr (kntrwl: khlasaha kntrwl): {[klyd: strngh]: koi bhy} |null {// twsayk ki mntak yhaan} hum ayk twsaykaty fnkshn bnanay kay liye wylywitr ayf ayn klas ka astamal krsktay hain js ko rd aml kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay: aykspwrt fnkshn kstm wylydaytr (): wylywytr ayf ayn {rytrn (kntrwl: khlasaha kntrwl): {[klyd: strngh]: koi bhy} |null => {// twsayk ki mntak yhaan} ؛}} hum kesi farm kntrwl kay liye jaizawn ki fharst main shaml krkay apni mrzuy kay mtaabk twsayk kar kay fnkshn ko astamal krsktay hayn۔'، [vilidators.required ، kstm wylydaytr ()])})}) ؛ hum un pt ansar kay liye hadayt ki fharst main shaml krkay tymplyt sy chlnay wali shkl main kstm wylywytr fnkshn ka astamal bhi krsktay hayn: <an pt taip = "tykst" nam= "nam" [(ngmodel)] = "nam" mtalwbha kstm wylydaytr> khlasaha main ، kwnyy main ayk kstm wylywytr bnanay main ayk aysy tkryb ki wzuahat shaml hawty hay jo ayk khlasaha kntrwl aabjykt ko dlyl kay tawr par lyta hay aur agar kntrwl drst hay ya kesi shay kay sath waps aajata haay۔aghr kntrwl ghalat hay tou ayk ghltay ka pygham۔ham ayk twsayk knndha ki tkryb bnanay kay liye wylywytr ayf ayn klas ka astamal krsktay hain jo rd aml kay farmwn kay sath astamal kya jaskta hay ، aur hum un pt ansar ki hadayt ki fharst main shaml krkay tymplyt sy chlnay wali shkl main kstm wylywytr fnkshn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: mshtrkha madaywl aur kwnyy main fychr madaywl main kya frk haay؟
Answer: mshtrkha madaywlza aur fychr madaywl dono kwnyy ayply kyshnza main aham hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hayn۔mshtrkha madaywlza aur fychr madaywl kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: mshtrkha madaywlya mshtrkha madaywl tamam mshtrkha hadayt ، ajzaaa aur paipwn ko daalnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo fychr madaywlza 123 main dwbarha astamal hawsktay hayn۔ ayk mshtrkha madaywl kwda ko zayada mnzam aur saaf rkhnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔kwda 13 ki nkl sy prhayza krna۔ mshtrkha madaywl bohat sy fychr madaywlza main draamd kya jata hay ، lhazaa mshtrkha madaywl kay andr kwnyy blt un madaywlza ko draamd aur braamd karna aam hay agar inhain mtadd mkamat 423 main rsaiy haasal karnay ki zurwrt haw۔ ayk mshtrkha madaywl ayk ksm ki khsawsayt madaywl 3 haay۔.fytwr madaywlya fychr madaywl sy mtalkha ajzaaa ، hadayat ، aur paipwn kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo ayply kyshn 142 ki khsawsayt ya dawmyn kay liye mkhsawsa hayn۔ ayk fychr madaywl astamal ko chhwtay ، zayada kabl antzaam tkrawn 42 main twranay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ ayk fychr madaywl ka astamal kya jata haay۔kwda ko zayada mnzam aur brkrar rkhnay kay liye aasan rkhyn۔madaywlza ، jabky ayk fychr madaywl sy mtalkha ajzaaa ، hadayat ، aur paipwn ko ghrwp karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo drkhwast ki khsawsayt ya dawmyn kay liye mkhsawsa hayn۔dawylprza kwda ko zayada mnzam rkhnay ، kwda ki nkl sy bchnay kay liye mshtrkha madaywlza aur fychr madaywl astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap kwnyy main khdmt kesay bnatay hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy main ayk khdmt bnanay kay l we ، hum un akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: trmynl ko khwlyn aur prwjykt daairktry par jaiyn۔ mndrjha zayl kmanda chla kar ayk niy khdmt bnanay kay liye kwnyy sy ayl aai ka astamal kryn: ayn jy tyar karain <srws-nam> yahan ، <srws-name> is khdmt ka nam hay js ko aap bnana chahti hayn۔ mzakwrha kmanda prwjykt main kuch failyn aur fwldar tyar krta hay aur is main kuch failwn ko bhi ap dayt kya jata haay۔) aur srws klas main wzuahat kryn۔ srws klas main ، un tarykwn aur khsawsayat ki wzuahat karain jo aap ayply kyshn main astamal karna chahti hayn۔ is jza ko js jzaw main aap ko astamal karna chahti hayn۔ajzaaa main khdmt kay tarykwn aur khsawsayat ka astamal kryn۔ khlasaha main ، kwnyy main ayk khdmt bnanay kay l we ، hum ayk niy khdmt pyda karnay ، srws klas ki wzuahat karnay ، aur draamd aur is jza ko anjykshn lghanay kay liye kwnyy sy ayl aai ka astamal krsktay hain jahan hum chahti hayn۔astamal krw.khdmat ko poray atalak main kwda aur faalyt ko bantnay aur kwda ko zayada mnzam aur brkrar rkhnay kay liye aasan bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: kwnyy main HTTPClient madaywl ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: HTTPClientModule kwnyywlr main ayk blt un srws madaywl hay jo dawylprza ko HTTP drkhwastwn ko anjam denay aur un drkhwastwn aur un kay rdaml 123 ko aasany sy jwranay ki ajazat dyta haay۔HTTPClientModule ayk srws madaywl hay kywnkha yeh sirf khdmat ko fwry tawr par pysh krta hay aur kesi bhi ajzaaa ، hadayt ya paip 1 ko braamd nahin krta haay۔HTTPClient srws HTTPClientModule madaywl main shaml hay ، jo HTTP drkhwastwn ko shrwa karnay aur kwnyy ayply kyshnza 23 main rdaml ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal ki jaskty haay۔HTTPClient madaywl HTTP prwtwkwl kay zaryaha dayta haasal karnay ya mntkl karnay kay liye byk aynda srwsza kay sath bat chyt karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ya tou XMLHTTPREQUEST antrfys ya bazayaft API34 ka astamal karty hawiay۔HTTPClient madaywl HTTP drkhwastwn 4 ko anjam denay kay liye mtadd tarykay mhaya krta hay ، jesay GET ، POST ، PUT ، hazaf ، aur pych۔HTTPClient madaywl bhi aysy khsawsayat fraham krta hay jesay drkhwast aur rspans mdakhlt ، hamwar ghltay sy nmtnay ، aur taip shuda rspans aabjykt 23 ki drkhwast karnay ki salahayt۔khlasaha yeh keh ، kwnyy main HTTPClient madaywl HTTP drkhwastwn ko anjam denay aur un drkhwastwn aur un kay rdaml ko aasany sy jwranay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔yha byk aynda srwsza kay sath bat chyt karnay aur kwnyy ayply kyshnza main HTTP drkhwastwn aur rdaml ko snbhalnay ka ayk aasan aur taaktwr tarykha fraham krta haay۔

Question: aap kwnyy main mshahadha karnay waly afrad ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: mshahadha karnay waly kwnyy main ayk aham tsawr hay jo mtzuad kwda ko snbhalnay aur wakaat 1 ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔mshahadha karnay waly wadwn sy mltay jltay hain lekin mazeed khsawsayat aur lchk 12 fraham karty hayn۔kwnyy main ، mshahadha karnay walon ko mkhtlf ksm kay aam mtzuad karrwaiywn ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jesay ayjyks ki drkhwastyn aur rdaml ، saarf kay un pt wakaat ، aur ayply kyshn 345 kay kuch hasawn kay mabyn pyghamat۔'RXJS' laibryry sy mshahadha karnay wala tabkha۔ mshahadha karnay waly tabkay ki ayk msaal tshkyl dy kar aur ayk mbsar kay fnkshn ko btawr dlyl pas krkay kabl mshahadha ki wzuahat kryn۔aabzarwr fnkshn is bat ki wzuahat krta hay keh jab mshahadha karnay waly ko sbskraib kya jata hay aur is sy akdar ka akhraj kesay hawta hay tou kya hawta haay۔aaprytrza aysay afaal hain jn ko mshahadha karnay waly tarza aml main trmym karnay kay liye mil kar jkraa jaskta haay۔sbskraib () ka tarykha ayk ya zayada afaal ko dlail kay tawr par lyta hay jo is bat ki wzuahat krta hay keh jab mshahadha karnay waly akdar ، ghltaywn ، ya mkml hony sy hawta hay tou kya hawta haay۔ khlasaha main ، mshahadha karnay waly kwnyy ki ayk taaktwr khsawsayt hay jo ghair mtzalzal kwda ko snbhalnay aur wakaat ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔dawylpr mtadd aam ghair mtzalzal karrwaiywn ko snbhalnay kay liye mshahadat ka astamal krsktay hain ، jesay ayjyks ki drkhwastyn aur rdaml ، saarf kay un pt wakaat ، aur drkhwast kay kuch hasawn kay mabyn pyghamat pas krna۔kwnyy main mshahadha karnay walon ko astamal karnay kay l we ، hum ayk mshahadha karnay waly ، aaprytrza ko is kay tarza aml ko tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hain ، aur akdar wsawl karna shrwa karnay kay liye is ko sbskraib krsktay hayn۔

Question: kwnyy main HTTP antrsyptrza ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: HTTP antrsyptrza kwnyy ki ayk taaktwr khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko ayply kyshn 123 main aalmy staha par HTTP drkhwastwn aur rdaml main trmym karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔antrsyptrza ayply kyshn aur srwr kay mabyn bythtay hain aur drkhwast aur rspans 34 kay sath taaml karty hayn۔antrsyptrza ko kstm haydar shaml karnay ، drkhwast kay jsm main trmym karnay ، twsayk/ajazat waly twkn mrtb karnay ، HTTP rdaml main trmym karnay ، ghltaywn ko snbhalnay ، aur lagh un drkhwastwn aur rdaml 135 kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔antrsyptrza bhi poray HTTP aapryshn 2 ka wkt aur lagh un karnay jesay kam anjam dy saktay hayn۔ kwnyy main HTTP antrsyptrza ka astamal karnay kay l we ، hum un akdamat ki pyrwy krsktay hayn: drkhwast main trmym karnay kay liye antrsyptr () antrsyptr main ayk antrsyptr bnaiyn۔ya jwab۔ ayp.mwdawl daat ty ays fail main antrsyptr ko fraham knndghan main shaml krkay۔antrsypt () tarykha kar ka khlasaha ، kwnyy main HTTP antrsyptrza ko drkhwast main aalmy staha par HTTP drkhwastwn aur rdaml main trmym karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dawylprza kstm haydar shaml karnay ، drkhwast baday main trmym karnay ، twsayk/ajazat waly twkn mrtb karnay ، HTTP kay rdaml main trmym karnay ، ghltaywn ko snbhalnay ، aur lagh un drkhwastwn aur rdaml kay l inter antrsyptrza ka astamal krsktay hayn۔kwnyy main HTTP antrsyptrza ko astamal karnay kay l we ، hum ayk antrsyptr tshkyl dy saktay hain ، antrsypt () kay tarykha kar ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، ayp.mwdawl daat ty ays fail main antrsyptr ko rjstr krsktay hain ، aur ayply kyshn main HTTPP drkhwastyn karnay kay liye HTTPClient srws ka astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: aap kwnyy main ghltaywn ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy main ghltaywn ko snbhalnay kay l we ، hum un nkat aur bhatryn tarykwn ki pyrwy krsktay hayn: klaint saiyda ki ghltaywn ko snbhalnay kay liye aar ayks jay ays aaprytrza kay thwrtr aur kych ayrr kay sath kwnyy ki HTTPClient srws ka astamal kryn۔HTTP ki drkhwast ki hogi hay ، aur yeh dayta ko jwab kay sath lwtata hay agar kuch ghalat hawta hay tou woh kesi ghltay ki haysayt ko kesi ghltay ki haysayt kay kwda 2 kay sath lwtata haay۔ aalmy ghltay ko hayndalr ko astamal karain takha tamam ghair mnkwlha ghltayan phns jien aur saarf 34 ko atalaa dyn۔ghltay ka hayndalr HTTP ki ghltaywn ko nahin phnsata hay ، lhazaa hamain HTTP ki ghltaywn ko snbhalnay kay liye HTTP antrsyptrza ka astamal karnay ki zurwrt haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، agar yeh pchhlay sray (HTTP ghltay) sy ghltay hay tou ، hum HTTP ki ghltaywn 34 ko snbhalnay kay liye zurwry aykshn 3. astamal karnay kay liye HTTP astyts kwda ka astamal krsktay hayn۔HTTP antrsyptrza ayply kyshn aur srwr kay mabyn bythtay hain aur drkhwast aur rspans 56 kay sath taaml karty hayn۔antrsyptrza ko kstm haydar shaml karnay ، drkhwast kay jsm main trmym karnay ، twsayk/ajazat waly twkn mrtb karnay ، HTTP rdaml main trmym karnay ، ghltaywn ko hayndal karnay ، aur lagh un drkhwastwn aur rdaml 152 kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔as khdmt ka astamal tamam HTTP drkhwastwn aur rdaml ko snbhalnay aur saarf kay dwstanha pyghamat ko saarf ko zaahar karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔dawylprza klaint saiyda ki ghltaywn ko snbhalnay kay liye aar ayks jay ays aaprytrza thrwwrr aur kych ayrr kay sath kwnyy ki HTTPClient srws ka astamal krsktay hain ، tamam baghair kesi ghltaywn ko phnsanay kay liye aalmy ghltay kay hayndalr ka astamal krsktay hain ، ghltay hayndalr main ghltay ki ksm ki janch pratal karain aur is kay mtaabk kam karain ، hayndal kay liye HTTP antrsyptrza ka astamal kryn۔aych ty ty py ki ghltayan ، aur mrkzay andaza main ghltaywn ko snbhalnay kay liye ayk alyhadha khdmt ka astamal kryn۔

Question: kwnyy main tarza aml aur ryplyswbykj kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: tarza aml aur ryplyswbykjk dono tarah kay mzuamyn hain jo kwnyy main mlty kast mshahadat kay liye astamal hawtay hain aur tamam saarfyn main ayk hi kdr ka ashtrak karty hayn۔taham ، un kay mabyn kuch akhtlafat hayn۔kwnyy main tarza aml aur ryplyswbykjykt kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: tarza aml sy mtalk tarza aml ki ayk ksm hay jo tamam saarfyn kay mabyn akdar ko kharj karnay aur aakhry kharj hony wali kymt 12 ko zakhyrha karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔ryplyswbykjykt ki ksm ، lekin azuafy faalyt ya hadwd kay sath is par mnhasar hay keh aap aai ty 12 ko kis tarah dykhtay hayn۔ ayk tarza aml ko kesi ayply kyshn ki mwjwdha haalt ko tryk rkhnay aur isy tamam saarfyn kay darmiyan bantnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔niay saarfyn ko "prany" akdar aur mtadd prany akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye mshahadha karnay waly aml kay ayk hasaay ko rykarda karna aur inhain niay sbskraibrza 134 par "ry play"۔kyshay aur ry play akdar ، nsl kay haalat ko snbhalyn ، aur niay saarfyn ko akdar ka ayk bfr fraham kryn۔tarza aml sy mtalk aakhry kymt ko astwr krta hay aur is kay liye abtdaiy kymt ko kharj karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jabky ryplyswbykjt niay saarfyn ko "prany" akdar bhyj sakta hay aur mtadd prany akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye mshahadha karnay waly amldraamd ka ayk hasaha rykarda krskta hay aur inhain niay saarfyn ko "ry play" krskta haay۔dawylprza kesi drkhwast ki mwjwdha haalt ko tryk rkhnay aur isy tamam saarfyn kay darmiyan bantnay kay liye tarza aml ka astamal krsktay hain ، jabky ryplyswbyjykt ko akdar ko kysh aur dwbarha chlanay ، nsl kay haalat ko snbhalnay ، aur niay saarfyn ko akdar ka ayk bfr fraham karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: aap kwnyywlr main kynyktywtyt aur kynday ko kesay astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy main ، kynyktywtyt aur kynday ayktywyt rwt ghardaza hain jo rwt 12 tak ya is sy rsaiy ko kntrwl karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔kwnywlr main kynyktywtyt aur kyndaytywyt ko astamal karnay kay tarykha kay baray main yahan tfsaylat hayn: kynyktywtytykanytytyt kwnyy rwtngh main ayk rwt gharda hay jo fysalha krta hay keh aya kesi rastay ko chalw kya jaskta haay۔ayk aysy khdmt jo bwlyn ya kabl mshahadha ya wadha waps krty hay jo bwlyn 12 sy hal hawty haay۔ kynyktywyt ko mkhsawsa saarfyn tak rwt tak rsaiy ko mhadwd karnay ، shraita ko pora karnay ko ykyny bnanay ، aur tsadyk aur ajazat ki janch pratal 32. kyndaykytytyktywytytyt ko kwnyy rwtngh main ayk rwt gharda hay jo kwnyy rwtngh main astamal kya jaskta haay۔fysalha krta hay keh aya kesi rastay ko ghair faal kya jaskta haay۔saarf ko rastha chhwranay sy pehlay mtnbha karain ، kesi rwt tak rsaiy sy pehlay dayta ko bazayaft karain ، aur farm ki twsayk chyk 42۔ khlasaha main ، kynyktywtyt aur kynday ayktywytyt kwnyywlr main rwt gharda hain jo kesi rastay tak ya kesi rastay tak rsaiy par kabw panay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔kynyktywyt ko kntrwl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh aya saarf kesi dyiay gaye rastay par tshryf la jaskta hay ، jabky kynday ayktywyt ko kntrwl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh aya saarf kesi dyiay gaye rastay sy door hawskta hay ya nhayn۔dawylprza kyn ayktywytyt aur kynday ayktywyt ko khdmat kay tawr par nafza krsktay hain jo bwlyn ya mshahadha karnay waly ya waday ko waps karty hain jo bwlyn ko hal krta haay۔an rwt ghardaza ko twsayk aur ajazat ki janch pratal karnay ، rastha chhwranay sy pehlay saarf ko aaghaha karnay ، kesi rastay tak rsaiy sy pehlay dayta bazayaft karnay ، aur farm ki twsayk ki janch pratal karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: kwnyy main async paip ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: Async paip kwnyy main ayk blt un paip hay jo mshahadha karnay ya wadha ki sbskraib karnay aur is ki tazaha trien kymt ko waps karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay js nay is ko kharj kya haay۔ASYNC paip mshahadha karnay walon sy ryndarngh dayta bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay aur bohat aasan 1 ka wadha krta haay۔ASYNC paip ko mshahadat ، wadwn ، aur yahan tak keh ayk fnkshn kay sath bhi astamal kya jaskta hay jo kabl mshahadha ya wadha 4 waps krta haay۔ASYNC paip khud bkhwd mshahadha karnay ya waday ki sbskraib krta hay aur sbskraib () ya phir () tarykha 5 ko kal krta haay۔jb jzaw tbaha hawjata hay tou ، ASYNC paip mymwry lyks 5 ko kam karnay kay liye khud bkhwd un sbskraib krta haay۔ASYNC paip kwnyy APP2 kay liye tbdyly ka ptha lghanay ki hakmt amly main bohat frk krskta haay۔ASYNC paip kwda ko mazeed prahnay kay kabl bnanay ، bwailr plyt kwda ko kam karnay ، aur mymwry lyks 4 sy bchnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔khlasaha tawr par ، kwnyy main Async paip ko mshahadha karnay ya wadha ki sbskraib karnay aur is ki tazaha trien kymt ko waps karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ASYNC paip ko mshahadha karnay walon sy ryndarngh dayta bnanay aur wadwn ko bohat aasan bnanay ، bwailr plyt kwda ko kam karnay ، aur mymwry lyk sy bchnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: aap kwnyy main ayn jy mshmwlat ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: ayn jy-mwad kwnyy main ayk blt un hadayt hay jo mwad kay prwjykshn 123 kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha ayk plys hawldar hay jo mthark mwad ko is wkt tak rkhta hay jab tak keh is ko parsda nahin kya jata haay۔ayn jy-mshmwl hadayt ka astamal waldyn kay jzaw sy la kar bchwn kay ajzaaa 45 ko mntkl karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ayn jy-mshmwl hadayt ka astamal bchwn kay jzaw kay tymplyt main ayk namzad jghha bnanay kay liye kya jata hay jahan waldyn ka jzaw mwad 5 pas krskta haay۔ayn jy-mshmwl hadayt ko slyktr wsaf 5 ka astamal karty hoey ayk sy zayada slat bnanay kay liye bhi astamal kya jaskta haay۔waldyn ka jzaw hr slat 5 par mkhtlf mwad bhyj sakta haay۔ayn jy-mshmwl hadayt ko dwbarha kabl astamal ajzaaa bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay js main waldyn sy bchwn kay jzaw ya is kay braks dayta ya mwad ko mntkl karnay sy kahain zayada aam ghnjaish hawty haay۔khlasaha yeh hay keh ، ayn jy mshmwlat kwnyy main ayk blt un hadayt hay jo mwad ki prwjykshn kay liye astamal hawta haay۔as ka astamal waldyn kay jzaw sy la kar bchwn kay jzaw main mntkl karnay aur bchwn kay jzaw kay sanchay main ayk namzad jghha bnanay kay liye kya jata hay jahan waldyn ka jzaw mwad ko pas krskta haay۔ayn jy-mwad ki hadayt ka astamal dwbarha kabl astamal ajzaaa bnanay kay liye kya jata hay js main waldyn sy la kar bchwn kay ajzaaa ya is kay braks dayta ya mwad ko mntkl karnay sy kahain zayada aam ghnjaish hawty haay۔

Question: kwnyy main hadayt aur jzaw kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: kwnyy main hadayt aur jzaw kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: daairyktyw daairyktyw dawm main ayk aysy hadayt hay jo mwjwdha dawm ansar ya kesi mwjwdha jzaw msaal kay tawr par azuafy tarza aml ko shaml karnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔waldyn sy bchwn kay ajzaaa ya is kay braks dayta ya mwad ko mntkl karnay sy kahain zayada amwmy dairha kar dawm main jwra twra karnay ، aywnt kay snnay walon ko shaml karnay ، aur mwjwdha ajzaaa 123 kay tarza aml main trmym karnay kay liye ayk hadayt ka astamal kya jaskta haay۔kstm anasar ، aur sakhty hadayt namha 123.compinenta jzaw ayk ksm ki hadayt hay jo nzaryha ko dayta fraham krta hay aur mnslk slwk 12364 kay sath ayk nya nzaarha (shydaw dawm) bnanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ ayk jzaw ayk wahad ywnt hay jo dono nzaaray aur mntak 126.A ko shaml krta haay۔ajzaaa ko ayply kyshn 34 kay UI kntrwl bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ ayk jzaw ko chhwtay ، zayada kabl antzaam tkrawn main twranay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ansar ya mwjwdha jzaw msaal kay tawr par ، jabky ayk jzaw ayk ksm ki hadayt hay jo nzaryha ko dayta fraham krta hay aur mnslk slwk kay sath ayk nya nzaarha (shydaw dawm) bnanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ksy hadayt ko dawm main jwra twra karnay ، aywnt kay snnay walon ko shaml karnay aur mwjwdha ajzaaa kay tarza aml main trmym karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، jabky ayk jzaw ko astamal kay UI kntrwl bnanay aur ayply kyshn ko chhwtay ، zayada mnzam tkrawn main twranay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: aap kwnyy main kstm hadayt kesay bnatay hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy main apni mrzuy kay mtaabk hadayt tyar karnay kay l we ، hum un akdamat par aml pyra hawsktay hayn: mndrjha zayl kmanda ko chla kar kwnyy sy ayl aai ka astamal karty hoey ayk nya hadayt bnaiyn: ayn jy jnryt hadayt <hadayt namha> yahan ، <hadayt namha> aap ki hadayt ka nam haaytkhlyk karna chahti hayn۔ mzakwrha kmanda prwjykt main kuch failyn aur fwldar tyar krta hay aur yeh kuch failwn ko bhi ap dayt krta haay۔ hadayt namha fail (jysay ، <hadayt namha>. daairyktyw daat ty ays) ko khwlyn aur hadayt ki klas ki wzuahat kryn۔ hadayt namha myn۔klas ، is tarza aml ki wzuahat karain jo aap dawm ansar main shaml karna chahti hayn۔ @hadayt namha ko kesi ansar kay sath kesi ansar kay sath mnslk karnay kay liye hadayt namha ka astamal kryn۔ madaywl main jahan aap isy astamal karna chahti hain is ki hadayt namha۔as jzaw ka HTML tymplyt jahan aap ansar main wsaf slyktr ko shaml krkay isy astamal karna chahti hayn۔ khlasaha ، kwnyy main ayk kstm hadayt bnanay kay liye ، hum ayk niy hadayt tyar karnay ، hadayt ki klas ki wzuahat karnay aur astamal karnay kay liye kwnyy sy ayl aai ka astamal krsktay hayn۔@hadayt kar daykwrytr ko kesi ansar kay sath ayk wsaf slyktr kay zaryaha hadayt ko jwranay kay liay۔mwjwdha dawm ansar ya mwjwdha jzaw msaal main azuafy slwk shaml karnay kay liye kstm hadayt ka astamal kya jata haay۔dawylprza dawm main hayra phyry karnay ، aywnt kay snnay walon ko shaml karnay ، aur mwjwdha ajzaaa kay tarza aml main trmym karnay kay liye kstm hadayt ka astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: kwnyy main myzaban baindangh daykwrytr ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kwnyy main myzaban baindangh daykwrytr ka astamal myzaban ansar ki praprty ko hadayt ya ajzaaa 1234 ki praprty sy bandhnay kay liye kya jata haay۔myzaban baindangh daykwrytr aap ko hadayt ya jzaw klas 12 sy myzaban ansar ki khsawsayat ko trtyb denay ki ajazat dyta haay۔myzaban baindangh daykwrytr ka astamal astail ki khsawsayat jesay awnchaiy ، chwraaiy ، rngh ، marjn ، bardar ، wghyrha ، ya hadayt ya jzaw klas 13 main myzaban ansar ki kesi bhi dusri dakhly khsawsayat ko tbdyl karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔myzaban baindangh daykwrytr ayk pyramytr lyta hay ، jo myzaban ansar ko bandhnay kay liye praprty ka nam haay۔ kwnyy main myzaban baindangh daykwrytr astamal karnay kay liye ، hum un akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: '@kwnyy/kwr' laibryry sy myzaban baindangh daykwrytr draamd kryn۔hadayt ya ajzaaa ki klas main ayk praprty js ko aap myzaban ansar sy bandhna chahti hayn۔ hawst baindangh daykwrytr ko myzaban ansar ki praprty kay sath jaiydad ko mnslk karnay kay liye astamal kryn۔ myzaban ansar ki praprty ka nam hawst baindangh daykwrytr sy kryn. waldyn kay jzaw kay HTML tymplyt main hadayt ya jzaw ka astamal kryn۔ khlasaha main ، kwnyy main myzaban baindangh daykwrytr myzaban ansar ki praprty ko hadayt ya jzaw ki praprty sy bandhnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔myzaban baindangh daykwrytr aap ko hadayt ya ajzaaa ki klas sy myzaban ansar ki khsawsayat ko trtyb denay ki ajazat dyta haay۔dawylpr astail ki khsawsayat jesay awnchaiy ، chwraaiy ، rngh ، marjn ، bardar ، wghyrha ، ya hadayt ya ajzaaa ki klas main myzaban ansar ki kesi bhi dusri dakhly khsawsayat ko tbdyl karnay kay liye myzaban baindangh daykwrytr ka astamal krsktay hayn۔kwnyy main myzaban baindangh daykwrytr ko astamal karnay kay l we ، hum hadayt ya ajzaaa ki klas main kesi praprty ki wzuahat krsktay hain ، hawst baindangh daykwrytr ko myzaban ansar ki praprty sy jaiydad ko jwranay kay liye astamal krsktay hain ، aur waldyn kay HTML tymplyt main hadayt ya jzaw ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ajzaaa

Question: aap kwnyy main NG-Template kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: ayn jy-tymplyt ayk kwnyy ansar hay jo tymplyt 1234 main HTML pysh karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔taham ، yeh braha rast DOM3 par nahin pysh kya jata haay۔ayn jy-tymplyt ansar ka astamal ayn jy aai ayf ، ayn jy ayf aw aar ، ayn jy ays dablywch ، ya kstm sakhty hadayt namha 153 jesay sakhty hadayt kay sath kya jata haay۔ayn jy-tymplyt hadayt namha ayk tymplyt blak ki wzuahat kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo mwad ko mthark tawr par pysh karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha HTML kwda ki wzuahat karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta hay jsay kwnyy jzaw 4 kay andr mtadd bar dwbarha astamal kya jaskta haay۔ayn jy-tymplyt hadayt namha ayn jy-kntynr hadayt namha 4 ka astamal karty hoey dawm main azuafy nwdas shaml kyay baghair anasar ko ghrwp karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ayn jy tymplyt hadayt ko mthark tawr par pysh karnay kay liye bhi astamal kya jaskta hay jo NG-content hadayt namha 4 ka astamal karty hoey waldyn kay jzaw sy ghzarta haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، ayn jy-tymplyt ayk kwnyy ansar hay jo tymplyt main HTML pysh karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ayn jy-tymplyt hadayt namha ayk aysay tymplyt blak ki wzuahat kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo mwad ko mthark tawr par pysh karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay aur kwnyy jzaw kay andr mtadd bar dwbarha astamal kya jaskta haay۔dawylprza ayn jy-tymplyt kay sath sath ayn jy aai ayf ، ayn jy ayf aw aar ، ayn jy ays dablywch ، ya kstm sakhty hadayt namha jesay sakhty hadayt kay sath astamal krsktay hayn۔ayn jy-tymplyt hadayt namha NG-Container aur NG-content hadayt namha kay sath bhi astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: kwnyy main dykhnay waly bchwn aur mshmwlat kay bchwn main kya frk haay؟
Answer: kwnyy main wyw bchwn aur mshmwlat kay bchwn kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: wywchldayn wyw faldarn ayk aysa sjawt hay jo anasar ki kwiry lst ya hadayt namha sy astamal kya jata haay۔ dekhain DOM123.Viewchilders bchwn kay ajzaaa ya hadaytwn ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo tymplyt main byan kya jata haay۔waldyn kay ajzaaa 123۔wyw kay bchay bchwn kay ajzaaa ya hadaytwn ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain jo waldyn kay ajzaaa kay pysh nzar ki wzuahat karty hayn۔bchwn kay ajzaaa ya hadayt namha 123۔kwntyndarkyntynt chldarn ayk aysa sjawt hay jo dawm 456 kay mwad sy anasar ya hadayat ki astfsar ki lst haasal karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔bchwn kay ajzaaa ya hadaytwn ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo waldyn kay ajzaaa 456 kay mwad main pysh kyay jatay hayn۔khlasaha ، wywdarynyn aur mshtrkha bchay kwnyy main sjawt hain jo anasar ki kwiry lst ya hadayt namha ko baltrtyb wyw dawm aur mshmwlat sy haasal karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔wywchldayn ka astamal bchwn kay ajzaaa ya hadaytwn ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye kya jata hay jo waldyn kay jzaw kay pysh nzar byan kyay jatay hain ، jabky mshmwlat bchwn ko bchwn kay ajzaaa ya hadaytwn ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo waldyn kay jzaw kay mshmwlat main pysh kyay jatay hayn۔wyw falzan bchwn kay ajzaaa ya hadaytwn ki ayk astfsar lst lwtata hay ، jabky mshmwl bchwn nay mtwka bchwn kay ajzaaa ya hadayt namwn ki ayk astfsar lwt liya haay۔

Question: aap kwnyy main aylymymrf ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: aylymnt ryf kwnyy ki ayk klas hay jo jzaw ya hadayt namha klas 12345 main kesi HTML ansar ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔aylymnt ryf klas aabaiy dawm ansar (HTML ansar) aabjykt kay ard ghrd ayk rypr hay ، aur is main praprty ki rhaaish ghaha hawty hay ، js main bnyady DOM aabjykt 13 ka hawalha hawta haay۔ham dawm ko jwra twra karnay aur HTML ansar 13 ki khsawsayat aur tarykwn tak rsaiy haasal karnay kay liye ansar ryf ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ham ajzaaa ya hadayt namha klas 13 main kesi HTML ansar kay ansar ko haasal karnay kay liye wywchaida daykwrytr ka astamal karty hayn۔jb hum knstrktr 13 main drkhwast karty hain tou hum jzaw ya hadayt kay myzaban ansar kay ansar ryf ko bhi anjykshn krsktay hayn۔ham kesi HTML ansar ka hawalha haasal karnay aur kwnyy ayply kyshnza 1345 main dawm ko jwranay kay liye ansar ryf ka astamal krsktay hayn۔khlasaha yeh keh ، aylymntryf kwnyywlr main ayk klas hay jo jzaw ya hadayt namha klas main HTML ansar ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔dawylprza dawm ko jwra twra karnay aur HTML ansar ki khsawsayat aur tarykwn tak rsaiy haasal karnay kay liye ansar ryf ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ham ajzaaa ya hadayt namha main kesi HTML ansar kay ansar ko haasal karnay kay liye wywchaida daykwrytr ka astamal krsktay hain ، aur jab hum is ki drkhwast karty hain tou hum is ki drkhwast karty hayn۔

Question: kwnyy main ryndar 2 ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: ryndarr 2 kwnyywlr main ayk klas hay jo kwnyy ayp kay anasar ko braha rast dawm ko chhwnay kay baghair jwranay kay liye ayk khdmt fraham krta haay۔ryndarr 2 klas ayk khlasaha hay jo kwnyy kay zaryaha anasar ko braha rast dawm 2 kay zaryaay chhwnay kay zaryaay jwra kar fraham kya jata haay۔ryndarr 2 klas DOM12 main anasar ko bnanay ، is main trmym karnay aur hazaf karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ryndarr 2 klas ka astamal klaswn ، shylywn aur anasar 12 ko awsaaf ko shaml karnay aur isy door karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ryndarr 2 klas anasar 12 par wakaat snnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ryndarr 2 klas mthark tsaawyr aur tranzayshn 12 bnanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ryndarr 2 klas kstm hadayt aur ajzaaa 12 bnanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ryndarr 2 klas dwbarha kabl astamal ajzaaa bnanay kay liye astamal hawta hay js main waldyn sy bchwn kay jzaw ya is kay braks 12 kay aadad wa shmar ya mwad ko mntkl karnay sy kahain zayada aam ghnjaish hawty haay۔khlasaha yeh keh ، ryndarr 2 kwnyywlr main ayk klas hay jo kwnyy ayp kay anasar ko braha rast chhwiay baghair jwranay kay liye ayk khdmt fraham krta haay۔dawylprza dawm main mwjwd anasar ko tkhlyk ، trmym aur hazaf karnay ، klaswn ، aslwb ، aur anasar sy safat ko shaml karnay aur un ko hatanay ، anasar par wakaat ko snnay ، mthark tsaawyr aur tranzayshn tkhlyk karnay ، apni mrzuy kay mtaabk hadayt aur ajzaaa tkhlyk karnay ، aur dwbarha astamal kay kabl ajzaaa tkhlyk karnay kay liye ryndar 2 ka astamal krsktay hayn۔waldyn sy la kar bchwn kay ajzaaa tak ya is kay braks dayta ya mwad ko pas karnay sy kahain zayada aam ghnjaish rkhyn۔

aajmnghl

aaj bdh hay

aaj jmarat hay

Question: kwnyy main wywchaida aur mshmwlat kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: yahan kwnywlr main wywchaida aur mshmwlat kay mabyn akhtlafat hayn: wywchailda wywchailda ayk aysa sjawt hay jo kesi ayk ansar ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay ya DOM123456 wyw sy hadayt namha haasal kya jata haay۔waldyn kay ajzaaa 123456 ka tymplyt۔ wyw chailda ko kesi bchay kay jzaw ya hadayt ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo waldyn kay ajzaaa 123456 kay pysh nzar byan kya jata haay۔ wyw chailda bchwn kay jzaw ya hadayt namha 123456 ka ayk hi hawalha waps krta haay۔ksy ayk ansar ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye ya mshmwlat sy hadayt namha DOM123456. kantyntaida ko kesi bchay kay jzaw ya hadayt ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo waldyn kay ajzaaa 123456 kay sanchay main pysh kya jata haay۔ya hadayt namha jo waldyn kay ajzaaa 123456 kay mwad main pysh kya jata haay۔baltrtyb dawm aur mwad dawm dykhyn۔wywchda ko kesi bchay kay jzaw ya hadayt ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay js ki taryf waldyn kay jzaw kay pysh nzar main ki jati hay ، jabky mshmwlat ko kesi bchay kay jzaw ya hadayt ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo waldyn kay jzaw kay mwad main pysh kya jata haay۔wywdaaida bchay kay jzaw ya hadayt ka ayk hi hawalha waps krta hay ، jabky mshmwl bchay bchay kay jzaw ya hadayt namha ka ayk hi hawalha bhi waps krta haay۔

Question: aap kwnyy main NG-Container hadayt kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: ayn jy-kntynr kwnyywlr main ayk hadayt hay jo DOM123456 main azuafy nwdas shaml kyay baghair anasar ko ghrwp karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ayn jy-kntynr hadayt ko ayk mntaky kntynr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay js main aai ty 13 kay andr mtadd anasar shaml hawsktay hayn۔asay kesi ansar ki haysayt sy askryn par nahin pysh kya jata hay ، bjaiay is kay keh yeh HTML3 main btawr tbsarha bay ghhr ho jata haay۔ham rn taim 1234 par dawm main koi azuafy ansar shaml kyay baghair HTML anasar ko lpytnay kay liye NG-Container astamal krsktay hayn۔ayn jy kntynr kwnywlr 12 main bay kar anasar sy bchnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ham ayn jy kntynr ka astamal krsktay hain jahan mtadd sakhty hadayat 13 astamal ki jati hayn۔ayn jy kntynr ko sakhty hadayt jesay ayn jy aai ayf ، ayn jy ayf aw aar ، ayn jy ays dablywch ، wghyrha 12346 kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha ayk bohat hi mfyd hadayt hay ، khasa tawr par jab ayn jy aai ayf ، ayn jy ayf aw aar ، wghyrha jesay sakhty hadayt kay sath kam krna۔khlasaha yeh keh ، ayn jy kntynr kwnyy main ayk hadayt hay jo dawm main azuafy nwdas shaml kyay baghair anasar ko ghrwp karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔dawylprza rn taim kay wkt dawm main koi azuafy ansar shaml kyay baghair aych ty aym ayl anasar ko lpytnay kay liye ayn jy kntynr ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ayn jy-kntynr ko sakhty hadayt jesay ayn jy aai ayf ، ayn jy ayf aw aar ، ayn jy ays dablywch ، wghyrha kay sath astamal kya jaskta haay۔ yeh ayk bohat hi mfyd hadayt hay ، khasa tawr par jab ayn jy aai ayf ، ayn jy ayf aw aar wghyrha jesay sakhty hadayt kay sath kam krna۔

Question: kwnyy main un pt aur aaؤt pt sjawt ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kwnyy main @an pt aur @aaؤt pt daykwrytrza kwnyy ayply kyshnza 123456 main waldyn aur bchwn kay ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta pas karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔an sjawt kay mkasad yeh hayn: inputthe input daykwrytr kesi bchay kay ajzaaa 123456 main un pt praprty ki wzuahat kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ @an pt daykwrytr ko waldyn kay jzaw sy dayta ko kesi bchay kay jzaw main mntkl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔jzaw praprty baindangh 25 ko haasal kryn۔waldyn kay ajzaaa 123456.in ka ayk bchha jzaw ، kwnyy main @an pt aur @aaؤt pt daykwrytrza kwnyy ayply kyshnza main waldyn aur bchwn kay ajzaaa kay mabyn dayta pas karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔@an pt daykwrytr ko bchay kay jzaw main un pt praprty ki wzuahat karnay aur waldyn kay jzaw sy dayta mntkl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔@aaؤt pt daykwrytr ko kesi bchay kay jzaw main aaؤt pt praprty ki wzuahat karnay aur bchwn kay jzaw sy dayta ko waldyn kay jzaw main mntkl karnay ya bchwn kay jzaw sy waldyn kay jzaw tak phanchanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: aap kwnywlr main dawm main trmym karnay kay liye ryndar 2 klas kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer:
kwnyy main dawm main trmym karnay kay liye ryndar 2 klas ko astamal karnay kay l we ، hum un akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: '@@kwnyy/kwr' laibryry sy ryndar 2 klas draamd kryn۔ ryndar 2 klas ko ajzaaa ya hadayt kar knstrktr main shaml kryn۔ tkhlyk karnay kay liye ryndar 2 klas ko astamal karain ،dawm main anasar main trmym karain ، aur hazaf kryn۔ anasar ko klas ، shylywn aur awsaaf ko shaml karnay aur hatanay kay liye ryndar 2 klas ka astamal kryn۔ anasar par wakaat ko snnay kay liye ryndar 2 klas ka astamal kryn۔ ryndar 2 klas ko mthark aur mntkly kay l use astamal kryn۔ ryndarr 2 astamal kryn۔apny mrzuy kay mtaabk hadayt aur ajzaaa tkhlyk karnay kay liye klas۔ yahan kwnywlr main dawm main trmym karnay kay liye ryndar 2 klas ko astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: draamd {ajzaaa ، ryndarr 2 ، ansar ryf 'say'@kwnyy/kwr '؛@ajzaaa ({slyktr:' ayp rwt'، tymplyt:'
'}) aykspwrt klas aypkmprynt {knstrktr (njy ryndarr: ryndarr 2 ، njy EL: ElementRef) {} ngafterViewInit () {const div = this.el.nativelement.querySelector ('#mydiv') ؛const text = this.renderer.createtext ('haylw ، dnya!') ؛this.renderer.appendchild (Div ، mtn) ؛this.renderer.addclass (div ، 'myra klas') ؛this.renderer.setstyle (div ، 'rngh' ، 'srkh') ؛this.renderer.listen (div ، 'klk' ، () => alrt ('klk kya ghya!')) ؛}} mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hamary pas ayk aysa jzaw hay js main ayk tymplyt hay js main hawalha Mydiv kay sath ayk DIV ansar hawta haay۔ngafterviewinit laif saikl hak main ، hum nay 'haylw ، wrlda!' kay mtn kay sath tykst nwda bnanay kay liye ryndar 2 klas ka astamal kya hay ، isy dayw ansar main shaml karain ، ayk klas mera klas shaml karain ، astail ka rngh trtyb dyn۔srkh ، aur Div ansar par klk aywnt snyn۔ khlasaha main ، kwnyy main ryndar 2 klas kwnywlr ayp kay anasar ko braha rast chhwiay baghair jwranay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dawylprza dawm main anasar ko bnanay ، is main trmym karnay aur hazaf karnay ، klaswn ، shylywn aur anasar sy safat ko shaml karnay aur un ko hatanay ، anasar kay wakaat ko snnay ، mthark tsaawyr aur mntkly tkhlyk karnay ، aur apni mrzuy kay mtaabk hadayt aur ajzaaa tkhlyk karnay kay liye ryndar 2 klas ka astamal krsktay hayn۔kwnyy main ryndar 2 klas ko astamal karnay kay l we ، hamain '@@kwnyy/kwr' laibryry sy ryndar 2 klas draamd karnay ki zurwrt hay ، isy jzaw ya hadayt denay waly knstrktr main anjykshn karain ، aur is ko dawm .1itnext2digitalocean3tektutorialshub4thedukh5Ch5Ch5Chetepage main jwra twra karnay kay liye astamal kryn۔

Question: kwnyy main @anjykshn daykwrytr ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kwnyy main @anjyk aybl daykwrytr klas ko btawr khdmt ki wzuahat karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay aur kwnywlr ko anhasaar 12 kay tawr par isy jzaw main anjykshn karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yhaan @anjyk aybl daykwrytr kay mkasad hayn: @ankj aybl daykwrytr ko ayk klas ko Angular12 main khdmt kay tawr par byan karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ @anjykshn daykwrytr is bat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh ayk jza ، klas ، paip ، ya ayn jy mwdawl ki khdmt 1 par anhasaar hawta haay۔. @anjykshn aybl daykwrytr myta dayta tyar krta hay jo anhasaar anjykshn kay liye sahayha tarykay sy kam karnay kay liye zurwry hawta hay ۔345 .۔ @anjykshn aybl daykwrytr klas ko ayk myta dayta fraham karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo kwnyy ko btata hay keh klas 3445 ko kis tarah tkhlyk kya jaiay۔ayk myta dayta jo kwnyy ko btata hay keh klas ko kis par anhasaar karna prata hay 345۔khdmt aur is ki nshandhay krty hay keh ayk jza ، klas ، paip ، ya ayn jy mwdawl ki khdmt par anhasaar hawta haay۔@anjyk aybl daykwrytr myta dayta tyar krta hay jo anhasaar anjykshn kay liye sahayha tarykay sy kam karnay kay liye zurwry hawta hay aur klas ko myta dayta fraham krta hay jo kwnyywlr ko btata hay keh klas ko kis tarah anhasaar karna hay ، aur un anhasaar ko kesay hal kya jaiay۔

Question: aap kwnywlr main awnait aur awndastrwy antrfys ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy main awnynt aur awndastrwy antrfys kwnyy ajzaaa aur hadaytwn main laif saiykl haks ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔an ko astamal karnay ka tarykha yeh hay kha: awnaitynyt antrfys ko kesi jzaw ya hadayt namha 1234 main nghwnynt () kay tarykha kar ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ jzaw ya hadayt ki tamyr kay bad haynghwnyt () kay tarykha kar ko sirf ayk bar kaha jata haay۔pychydha mntak ko anjam dyn aur dayta 1234 ko bazayaft kryn۔ ghnghwnyt () ka tarykha kar ko shrwa karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ya hadayt kay bad kwnyy pehlay aadad wa shmar sy mnslk khsawsayat ko zaahar krta hay aur un pt praprtyza 3 ka tayn krta haay۔ya hadayt namha 12564۔ ayn jywndastrwy () ka tarykha kar jzaw ya hadayt ko tbaha hony sy thyk pehlay kaha jata haay۔ya hadayt namha 2564.in ka khlasaha ، kwnyy main awnynt aur awndastrwy antrfys kwnyy ajzaaa aur hadaytwn main laif saiykl haks ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ngoninit () ka tarykha kar ko shrwa karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ya kwnyy pehlay dayta sy mnslk khsawsayat ko zaahar karnay aur un pt praprtyza ka tayn karnay kay bad is ka astamal kya jata hay ، jabky Ngondestroy () ka tarykha mymwry lyk sy bchnay aur safaiy kay kamwn ko anjam denay kay liye wsail ko jary karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔jzaw ya hadayt۔dawylprza un antrfys ko pychydha mntak ko nafza karnay ، aadad wa shmar ko bazayaft karnay ، aur kwnyy ajzaaa aur hadaytwn main safaiy kay kam anjam denay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: kwnyy main wakaha pysh karnay waly aur mzumwn ki klaswn main kya frk haay؟
Answer: aynghwlr main wakaha pysh karnay waly aur sbjykt klaswn kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: aywnt mytyr aywntymytr ayk kwnyy khlasaha hay jo aar ayks jay ays sbjykt klas 123 ko brahata haay۔phalay sy taay shuda ، lekin isy flygh 4 ko pas krkay mtzuad bnaya jaskta haay۔ aywntymytr ko sirf @aaؤt pt () kay liye ajzaaa aur hadayt namwn main astamal karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔Angular523 main ajzaaa ya khdmat kay drmyan۔ sbjykt dayfalt 4 kay zaryaha mtzuad haay۔ sbjykt ko aywntymytr 2۔mry main zayada aam mkasad kay liye astamal karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔aywntymytr ayk kwnyy tjryd hay jo RXJS sbjykt klas ko brahata hay aur bnyady tawr par jab saarf ki karrwaiy hawty hay tou woh kesi bchay kay jzaw sy apnay waldyn kay jzaw main dayta mntkl karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔aywntymytr btawr dayfalt hum wkt saza hay aur isy sirf @aaؤt pt () kay liye ajzaaa aur hadaytwn main astamal karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔mwzuwa RXJs main ayk klas hay jo mshahadha karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay aur kwnyy main ajzaaa ya khdmat kay mabyn dayta ko mntkl karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔mzumwn btawr dayfalt mtzuad hay aur isy aywntymytr sy zayada aam mkasad kay liye astamal karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔

Question: aap kwnyy main NGIF hadayt kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟

Answer: kwnyy main ansar ryf aur tymplytyr mkhtlf klasza hain jo mkhtlf mkasad kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔ansar ryf aur tymplytryf kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: aylymyntryft aylymyntryf klas DOM12345 main aabaiy ansar tak rsaiy kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ ansar ryf klas aabaiy ansar 12345 ki khsawsayat aur safat ko jwranay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ ansar ki klas ko hawalha haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ansar js ki hadayt ko 12345 sy mnslk kya jata haay۔ ansar ryf klas dawm tak braha rast rsaiy kay liye astamal hawta hay ، js ki sfarsh kwnywlr 2345 main nahin ki jati haay۔mthark tawr par 12345 kay nzaaray bnaiyn۔ tymplytryf klas kesi jzaw ya hadayt namha 12345 ko dayta ko mntkl karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ tymplytryf klas kwnywlr 2345.in main mthark ajzaaa bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ansar ryf klas dawm main aabaiy ansar tak rsaiy haasal karnay ، aabaiy ansar ki khsawsayat aur safat main hayra phyry karnay aur is ansar ka hawalha haasal karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay js sy hadayt sy mnslk hawta haay۔tymplytryf klas ko aymbydada tymplyt ki nmaindghy karnay ، mthark tawr par nzaaray bnanay ، kesi jzaw ya hadayt ko dayta mntkl karnay ، aur kwnyy main mthark ajzaaa bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Iterablachanges antrfys ko wkt kay sath sath itable56 tak tbdylywn ka sragh lghanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ Iterablechanges antrfys NGFOR kay zaryaha DOM5 main msawy tbdylywn ko mtasar krkay kesi kabl tbdylywn ka jwab denay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ Iterablechanges antrfys ko kstm Iterableffer tyar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay takha kstm Iterableffer tyar kya jaskay۔trykngh main tbdyly kay kabl mjmwaha۔dawylpr aapryshnza kay ayk syt par tkrar karnay kay liye Iterablechanges antrfys ka astamal krsktay hain jo ، jab asal kabl tklyd par laghw hawta hay tou ، nya kabl tklyd tyar kray ga ، baghair kesi aaitm main tbdylywn kay baray main malwmat fraham kray ga ، wkt kay sath sath kesi kabl tghyrat ka ptha lghaiyn ، tbdylywn ka jwab dyn۔DOM main msawy tbdylywn ko mtasar karnay kay zaryaha baghair kesi kabl zakr zakhyrwn main tbdylywn sy bakhbr rhanay kay liye ayk kstm Iterablablefr tyar kryn۔

Question: aap kwnyy main mshahadha karnay waly afrad kay sath ASYNC/AWAT SYNTAX ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer:
kwnyy main mshahadha karnay waly afrad kay sath Async/Awate Syntax ka astamal karnay kay l we ، hum un akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: Rxjs laibryry sy mshahadha karnay waly klas ko draamd kryn۔ mshahadha karnay waly ko kesi waday main tbdyl karnay kay liye Topromise () ka tarykha astamal kryn۔wadha. yahan kwnywlr main mshahadat kay sath Async/Awate Syntax ka astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: '@kwnyy/kwr' sy draamd {ajzaaa} draamd {httpclient} sy '@kwnyy/aam/http' ؛ draamd {mshahadha} sy draamd karain 'rxjs '؛@ajzaaa ({slyktr:' ayp rwt '، tymplyt:'
{{dayta | async}}
'}) braamd klas aypkmprynt {dayta: wadha ؛knstrktr (njy HTTP: httpclient) {} ngoninit () {this.data = this.getData () ؛} async getData () {const url = 'https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/todos/1' ؛kanst dayta = is ka antzaar kryn۔ http.get (url) .topromise () ؛dayta dayta ؛}} mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hamary pas dayta praprty wala jzaw hay jo ASYNC paip ka astamal karty hoey tymplyt main DIV ansar ka pabnd haay۔ghyt dayta () kay tarykha kar main ، hum nay HTTP srws ka astamal HTTP ki drkhwast karnay kay liye kya hay aur ntyjay main kabl mshahadha ko tap prwmaiza () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey kesi waday main tbdyl kya haay۔as kay bad hum nay ASYNC/AWAT SYNTAX ka astamal wadha ko snbhalnay aur aadad wa shmar ko waps karnay kay liye astamal kya haay۔ khlasaha ، ASYNC/AWAT SYNTAX ko Angular main mshahadha kay sath astamal karnay kay liye ، hamain RXJS laibryry sy mshahadha karnay waly tabkay ko draamd karnay ki zurwrt hay ، tappwmaiza astamal karain ()mshahadha karnay waly ko kesi waday main tbdyl karnay ka tarykha ، aur wadha ko snbhalnay kay liye ASYNC/AWAT SYNTAX ka astamal kryn۔

Question: kwnywlr main ayp_aynytylaizar twkn ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kwnyy main ayp_aynytylaizar twkn ka astamal ayk ya zayada abtdaa kay afaal fraham karnay kay liye kya jata hay jo kwnyy ayply kyshn bwtstrypda 123 hony par phansy di jati haay۔yhaan ayp_aynaitylaizar twkn kay mkasad hayn: ayply kyshn 1245 chlanay sy pehlay ayp_aynytylaizar twkn kwda kay blak par aml draamd karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔app_initializer twkn kwnyy ayplykyshn 1245 ko shrwa karnay kay liye saaf aur mwsar tarykha fraham karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ ayp_aynaitlaizar twkn ko ayk wadha ya kabl mshahadha fraham karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo ayply kyshn 123 ko pysh karnay sy pehlay hal krta haay۔ kwnyy main ayp_aynytylaizar twkn ko astamal karnay kay liye ، hamain is ki wzuahat karnay ki zurwrt hay kywnkha hamain is ki wzuahat karnay ki zurwrt haay۔@kwnyy/kwr madaywl main fraham knndha۔yha ayk dlyl kay tawr par ayk fnkshn lyta hay aur ayk wadha ya kabl mshahadha waps krta haay۔jb ayply kyshn shrwa hawjaty hay tou ، kwnyy ayp_ anytylaizar fraham knndha ki drkhwast krta hay aur ayply kyshn 123 main pysh karnay sy pehlay wadha ya mshahadha karnay kay liye antzaar krta haay۔aadad wa shmar ko lwda karnay kay tawr par ، twsayk ko anjam denay ، ya drkhwast kay mahawl ko tshkyl denay kay bad ، kwnyy ayply kyshn ko shrwa karnay ka ayk saaf aur mwsar tarykha fraham karain ، aur ayk wadha ya kabl mshahadha fraham karain jo drkhwast ko pysh karnay sy pehlay hal krta haay۔dawylprza abtdaiy afaal ki wzuahat kay liye ayp_aynytylaizar twkn ka astamal krsktay hain jo kwnyy ayplykyshn bwtstrypda hawtay wkt phansy di jati haay۔

Answer: plyt farm braiwzardaynyamk tarykha ka astamal karty hoey kwnyy ayply kyshn ko bwtstryp karnay kay l we ، hum un mrahal par aml krsktay hayn: @kwnyy/plyt farm-braؤzar-daainamk laibryry sy plyt farm braؤzar daainymk tarykha ko draamd kryn۔ ayk madaywl tyar karain jo ayply kyshn ki jra ki nmaindghy krta haay۔madaywl.hayray kwnywlr ayply kyshn ko bwtstryp karnay kay liye plyt farm braؤzardayamk tarykha astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: '@kwnyy/plyt farm-braؤzar-daainymk' sy farm plyt farm braiwsrdayamk} draamd {aypmwdawl} sy 'bwtstryp mwdawl (aypmwdawl). kych (ayr => knswl.rwr (ayrr)) ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hum nay @kwnyy/plyt farm braؤzar-daainamk laibryry sy plyt farm braؤzardayamk tarykha draamd kya haay۔as kay bad hum nay aypwmwdawl ko bwtstryp karnay kay liye plyt farm braؤzardayamk tarykha astamal kya hay ، jo ayply kyshn ki jra ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، kwnyy main plyt farm braؤzardaynytk tarykha ko ayk madaywl bnanay kay zaryaha ayk ayply kyshn ko bwtstryp karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo ayply kyshn ki jra ki nmaindghy krta hay aur plyt farm braiwzar daainymk tarykha astamal krta haay۔madaywl ko bwtstryp krna۔dawylprza @kwnyy/plyt farm-braؤzar-daainamk laibryry sy plyt farm braؤzardayamk tarykha ko draamd krkay aur is ko bwtstryp karnay kay liye madaywl .1 ghythwb 2 plwralsait 3 tytwrylshb 4 astyk awwr flw 5nghwlr kay zaryaha plyt farm braiwsrdayamk tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: kwnywlr main wywchwlyn aur kwiyr lst main kya frk haay؟
Answer: wyw bchwn aur astfsar ki fharst kwnyy main mtalkha tsawrat hain ، jabky wywdaaida ayk alag tsawr haay۔yhaan wyw falza aur kwiyr lst kay mabyn akhtlafat hayn: wywchldayn wywywchaildaryn ayk aysa sjawt hay jo ayk sy zayada anasar kay liye dawm sy astfsar karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay jo ayk mkhsawsa slyktr 12345 sy myl khata haay۔ wyw faldaryn anasar ki ayk astfsar lwtatay hain jo slyktr 12345 sy mltay hayn۔ wywywchylyn ko kesi jza main mtadd bchwn kay anasar tak rsaiy haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ya hadayt namha 12345. wyw bchwn ka astamal kesi bchay kay jzaw ya hadayt ka hawalha haasal karnay aur is ki praprtyza 12345 sy jwranay kay liye kya jata haay۔ kwiyrlst kwiyr lst ayk aysy klas hay jo ayk mkhsawsa slykshn 12364 sy mlnay wali ashyaa ki fharst ko astwr karnay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔ kwiyrylst ko wywchaildayn ya skwndaryn kay zaryaha waps krdha ashyaa ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ayk lst 12364 myn۔ kwiyr lst ko ap dayt kya jata hay jab bhi drkhwast ki haalt tbdyl hawty hay 12364.kywr lst ko aaitmza ki fharst par tkrar karnay aur un par kam karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔wywchldayn ayk sjawt hay jo ayk sy zayada anasar kay liye dawm sy astfsar karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay jo ayk mkhsawsa slyktr sy mltay hain aur slyktr sy mlnay waly anasar ki ayk astfsar lst lwtatay hayn۔wyw bchwn ko kesi jzaw ya hadayt main mtadd bchwn kay anasar tak rsaiy haasal karnay aur bchwn kay jzaw ya hadayt ka hawalha haasal karnay aur is ki khsawsayat main hayra phyry kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔kwiry lst ayk klas hay jo aaitmza ki fharst ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawty hay jo ayk mkhsawsa slyktr sy mmasal hawty hay aur un ki fharst main tkrar karnay aur un par kam karnay kay liye astamal ki jaskty haay۔
