'، mthark tsaawyr: [animate (' 1s '، andaza ({dhndlapn:'*'}) ، andaza ({opacity: 0}))]}) klas aypkmprynt {knstrktr.؛kwnst plyir = fyktry۔ kryt (dstawyza.kyry slyktr ('dayw')) ؛plyir۔ play () ؛}} mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hamary pas ayk DIV ansar wala jzaw hay jo [@fyda un aaؤt] nhaw ka astamal karty hoey harkt pzayry ka pabnd haay۔ngafterviewinit () kay tarykha kar main ، hum nay mthark fyktry aur ayk harkt pzayry plyir ki msaal bnanay kay liye anymyshn bldar srws ka astamal kya haay۔as kay bad hum nay harkt pzayry ka aaghaza karnay kay liye anymyshn plyir kay play () ka tarykha astamal kya haay۔ khlasaha un ka khlasaha ، kwnyy main harkt pzayry bldar srws kesi jzaw ya hadayt kay andr prwghram kay sath mthark tsaawyr bnanay kay liye astamal hawty haay۔anymyshn bldar srws ko astamal karnay kay l we ، hamain isy @kwnyy/mthark tsaawyr laibryry sy draamd karnay ki zurwrt hay ، isy is jzaw ya hadayt main anjykshn karain jahan hum isy astamal karna chahti hain ، harkt pzayry bldar srws kay blda () tarykha ko ayk harkt pzayry fyktry ki msaal bnanay kay liye astamal kryn۔، harkt pzayry plyir ki msaal bnanay kay liye mthark fyktry kay tkhlyk () ka tarykha astamal karain ، aur harkt pzayry shrwa karnay kay liye anymyshn plyir kay play () tarykha ka astamal kryn۔

Question: kwnyy main inmemorywebapimodule ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kwnyy main inmemorywebapimodule ayk madaywl hay jo dayta bnanay aur lanay kay liye ayk mymwry main dayta astwr mhaya krta hay ، js main ayk hakyky REST API byk aynda 1 ki nkaly hawta haay۔yhaan inmemorywebapimodule kay mkasad hayn: inmemorywebapimodule ko ayk baky API ka mzaak araanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔API byk aynda jab asal byk aynda sstm abhi tak frnt aynda dawylpmnt tym 1 kay zaryaha khpt kay l ready tyar nahin haay۔ anymwry wyw bypymwdawl ko asal byk aynda sstm 1 kay liye astynda an/praksy fraham karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔Angular1 main REST API ki nkaly karnay ka saaf sthra aur mwsar tarykha۔ kwnyy main inmemorywebapimodule astamal karnay kay l we ، hamain isy kwnyy un mymwry-wyb-API laibryry sy draamd karnay ki zurwrt hay ، ayk aysy khdmt bnaiyn jo inmemorydbservice antrfys ko nafza kray ، aur HTTPClientInMemorewapimodule draamd kray۔aypmwdawl myn۔inmemorydbservice antrfys mymwry main kesi aysy chyza ko bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo hamary dayta bys ki nmaindghy krta haay۔aabjykt ki hr klyd hamary dayta bys ki ayk hasty ki nmaindghy krty hay ، jesay msanwaat۔HTTPClientInMemorywebapimodule kwnyywlr HTTP aur HTTPClient ki drkhwastwn ko rwknay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo bsawrt dyghr rymwt srwr par jien ga aur inhain ayk mymwry waly dayta astwr par bhyj dyn ga js par hum kntrwl 2۔jry main ، kwnyy main mwjwd ayk madaywl hay jo ayk aysay aadad wa shmar mhaya krta hay jo ayk mbynha aadad wa shmar fraham krta haay۔dayta bnanay aur lanay kay liye astwr karain ، ayk hakyky REST API byk aynda kay aakhr main nkaly kryn۔dawylprza anymwry wywpymwdawl ka astamal un mymwry dayta bys kay sath ayk REST API ka mzaak karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hain ، kwnyy ayply kyshn kay liye jaly byk aynda sstm mhaya krsktay hain ، jab hakyky byk aynda sstm khpt kay liye abhi tyar nahin hawta hay tou ayk hakyky REST API byk aynda ki nkaly krsktay hayn۔frnt aynda dawylpmnt tym kay zaryaha ، asal byk aynda sstm kay liye astynda an/praksy fraham karain ، aur kwnyy main ayk REST API ki nkl karnay ka ayk saaf aur mwsar tarykha fraham kryn۔

Question: aap kwnywlr main bchwn kay jzaw sy waldyn kay jzaw tak dayta kharj karnay kay liye aywntymytr klas ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: aywntymytr klas ka astamal karty hoey kwnyy main kesi bchay kay jzaw sy waldyn kay jzaw tak dayta kharj karnay kay l we ، hum un akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: bchwn kay jzaw main ، aywntymytr main ، (wakaha) nhaw ka astamal karty hoey aywnt ka pabnd karain aur waldyn kay jzaw main ayk tarykha par kal kryn۔ waldyn kay jzaw main ، tkhlyk karain ، tkhlyk kryn۔ayk aysa tarykha jo kharj hony waly aadad wa shmar ko dlyl kay tawr par haasal krta haay۔ yahan ayk msaal hay keh aywntymytr klas ko bchay kay jzaw sy kwnyy main waldyn kay jzaw main dayta kharj karnay kay liye astamal () {this.dataevent.emit ('bchwn kay ajzaaa sy dayta') ؛}} // parent.component.tsimport '@kwnyy/kwr' say@jzaw (@jzaw ({slyktr: 'ayp pyrnt' ، tymplyt: '<ayp-chlda (dayta aywnt) = "OnDataEvent ($ wakaha)"> </app-child> '}) klas pyrnt kampynt {Ondataevent (dayta: strngh) {knswl.lagh (dayta) ؛}} mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hamary pas ayk btn ka jzaw hay js main ayk btn hay jo klk karnay par tar kharj krta haay۔ham nay aywnt myttr klas ko aywnt aymytr ki msaal bnanay kay liye astamal kya hay aur isy @aaؤt pt () daykwrytr sy sjaya haay۔as kay bad hum nay dayta ko kharj karnay kay liye aywnt aymytr kay emit () tarykha kar ka astamal kya haay۔waldyn kay jzaw main ، hum (dayta aywnt) nhaw ka astamal karty hoey aywnt ka pabnd hain aur waldyn kay jzaw main ayk tarykha kehty hayn۔as kay bad hum nay ayk aysa tarykha tyar kya hay jo kharj hony waly aadad wa shmar ko dlyl kay tawr par haasal krta haay۔ khlasaha main ، aywntymytr klas ka astamal karty hoey kwnyy main kesi bchay kay jzaw sy waldyn kay jzaw tak dayta kharj karnay kay liye ، hamain aywntymytr klas ki ayk msaal bnanay aur isy sjanay ki zurwrt haaybchwn kay jzaw main @aaؤt pt () daykwrytr ، ayk aysa tarykha tyar karain jo aywntymytr msaal kay emit () tarykha ka astamal karty hoey dayta ko kharj kray ، (wakaha) nhaw ka astamal karty hoey aywnt ka pabnd karain aur waldyn kay jzaw main ayk tarykha par kal karain ، aur Question: kwnyy fraham karnay walon main farwrdaryf aur yw ays sy ayl aay ays kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: farwrdaryf aur yw ays sy ayl aay ays dono kwnyy fraham karnay walon main astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hayn۔farwrda ryf aur yw ays sy ayl aay ays ays kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: farwrdaryfwrwrdaryf ayk aysa fnkshn hay jo kesi fraham knndha ki taraf asharha karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay js ki abhi tak wzuahat nahin ki jati haay۔kwda 1234.fwrwrda ryf kesi fraham knndha kay hal main takhyr kay liye astamal kya jata hay jab tak keh is ki hakykt main 1234 ki zurwrt nah haw۔ yw ays sy aylassklas ayk fraham knndha ki ayk praprty hay jo is klas ki wzuahat karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay js ko fwry tawr par bnaya jana chahaiay jab fraham knndha ko anjkshn lghaya jata haay۔ayk tjrydy tabkay ya antrfys 6234 ka nfaza۔ ywzaklas ka astamal is tabkay ki wzuahat kay liye kya jata hay js ka astamal anhasaar 6234 ko pora karnay kay liye kya jana chahaiay۔ khlasaha main ، farwrda ryf aur yw ays sy ayl aay ays dono kwnyy fraham knndghan main astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh mkhtlf mkasad ki tkmyl karty hayn۔farwrdaryf ayk aysa fnkshn hay jo kesi aysay fraham knndha ka hawalha denay kay liye astamal hawta hay js ki abhi tak wzuahat nahin ki jati hay ، fraham knndghan kay mabyn srklr anhasaar twra dyn ، kesi aysay fraham knndha ka hawalha dyn jo bad main kwda main aalan kya jata hay ، aur fraham knndha ki krardad main takhyr krta hay jab tak keh is ki asal zurwrt nah haw۔yw ays sy ayl aay ays ays ayk fraham knndha ki ayk praprty hay jo is klas ki wzuahat kay liye astamal hawty hay jsay fwry tawr par anjkshn lghaya jata hay ، ayk tjrydy tabkay ya antrfys ka thws nfaza fraham krta hay ، aur is klas ki wzuahat karain js par anhasaar ko pora karnay kay liye astamal kya jana chahaiay۔

Answer: kwnyy main swich myp aur mrj myp aaprytrza dono ko mshahadha karnay waly kay zaryaha kharj hony wali ashyaa ko tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، lekin woh is main mkhtlf hain keh woh andrwny mshahadat kay akhraj ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn۔swich myp aur mrj myp kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: swich mypwch myp ayk aaprytr hay jo makhza kay zaryaha kharj hony waly hr kdr ko ayk niay mshahadha karnay kay kabl bnata hay ، aur phir andrwny kay akhraj ko ayk wahad mshahadha karnay wala 1234 main chpta krta haay۔makhza kay zaryaha wylyw ka akhraj kya jata haay۔as kay bad andrwny mshahadha kay akhraj ko ayk hi mshahadha karnay wala 1234 main zum krdya jata haay۔ myrj myp pchhlay andrwny mshahadha ko mnswkh nahin krta hay jab makhza kay zaryaha ayk niy kdr kharj hawty haay۔makhza mshahadha karnay wala 1234. un smry main ، swich myp aur mrj myp dono ko mshahadha karnay waly kay zaryaha kharj hony wali ashyaa ko tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، lekin woh is main mkhtlf hain keh woh andrwny mshahadat kay akhraj ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn۔swich myp pchhlay andrwny mshahadha ko mnswkh krta hay jab makhza kay zaryaha ayk niy kdr kharj hawjaty hay ، jabky mrj myp nahin krta haay۔swich myp ka astamal is wkt kya jata hay jab hum kesi niay mshahaday par swich karna chahti hain jab bhi kesi niy kdr ko makhza kay zaryaha kabl mshahadha kya jata hay ، jab mrj myp astamal kya jata hay jab hum andrwny mshahadat kay akhraj ko makhza kay akhraj kay sath zum karna chahti hayn۔

؛atherail (() => {httpmock.verify () ؛}) ؛yha ('saarfyn ki ayk saf ko waps karna chahaiay' ، () => {const mocusers = [{id: 1 ، nam: 'jan'} ، {ID: 2 ، nam: 'jyn'}] ؛ srws.ghtaizarza ().subscribe (saarfyn => {twka (saarf۔ lmbaiy)saarfyn ') ؛ twka (req.request.method) .tobe (' get ') ؛ Req.flush (Mocusers) ؛}) ؛}) ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hum nay HTTPClientTestingModule aur HttptestingController astamal kya hay takha HTTP ki drkhwast ka mzaak araaya jaskay۔dayta srws mynham nay tyst madaywl ko tshkyl denay kay liye tyst by ay day۔ kwkwrytstngh mwdawl () ka tarykha astamal kya hay aur HTTPClientTestingModule ko shaml kya haay۔as kay bad hum nay HTTPTESTINGCONTROLLER.EXPECTONE () ka tarykha astamal kya hay takha HTTP drkhwast ko rwkyn aur mzaak ka jwab fraham kya jaskay۔kwnyy ywnt ki janch main HTTPSTINGCOLROLLER.Verify () tarykha astamal karnay kay liye hum nay HTTP ki koi bkaya drkhwastyn mwjwd nahin hayn۔HTTPClientStestingModule ، HTTP ki drkhwast ko rwkyn aur HTTPTESTINGCONTROLLER.EXPECTONE () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ayk mzaak ka jwab fraham karain ، aur is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh HTTPTESTINGCONTROLLER.verify () tarykha astamal karty hoey HTTP ki koi bkaya drkhwastyn mwjwd nahin hayn۔dawylpr un tarykwn ko apnay kwnyy ywnt tystwn main HTTP ki drkhwastwn ka mzaak araatay hain aur is bat ko ykyny bnasktay hain keh un kay ajzaaa aur khdmat sahayha tarykay sy brtaؤ kryn۔

Question: kwnyy ywnt tystngh main testbed.inject aur testbed.get kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: testbed.get () ka tarykha kwnyy 9+ main frswdha hay ، aur testbed.inject () ab anhasaar 12 ko anjykshn lghanay ka trjyhay ksm ka mhafwza tarykha haay۔yhaan testbed.get () aur testbed.inject (): testbed.get () testbed.get () kay darmiyan akhtlafat hain jo kwnyy 9+12.testbed.get () main ayk frswdha tarykha haay۔tyst byda ka anjyktr 12. tyst byda۔ ghyt () taip syf nahin hay aur agar anhasaar nahin paya jata hay tou rn taim ki ghltaywn ka sbb bn sakta haay۔testbed.inject () tyst byda kay anjyktr sy anhasaar bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay js main taip syf way 12.testbed.inject () ayk ghltay phynk dyta hay agar anhasaar nahin paya jata hay tou ، trky kay doran ghltaywn ko pkrana aasan hawjata haay۔testbed.get () kwnyy 9+ main ayk frswdha tarykha hay jo tyst byda kay anjyktr sy anhasaar bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، jabky tyst byda daat aynjykt () kwnyy 9+ main anhasaar anjykshn karnay ka trjyhay tarykha hay jo A ko bazayaft karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ksm kay mhafwza tarykay sy tyst byda kay anjyktr sy anhasaar۔dawylprza ko rn taim ki ghltaywn sy bchnay aur taip syfty ko ykyny bnanay kay liye tyst byda daat jy jy () kay bjaiay tyst byda daat aynjykt () astamal karna chahaiay۔

Question: aap kwnyy ywnt tystngh main aspaiywn () ka tarykha kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy ywnt tystngh main aspaiywn () ka tarykha ayk jasws aabjykt bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo hamain kalwn ko kesi tarykha par tryk karnay aur is kay tarza aml ko tbdyl karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔kwnyy ywnt tystngh main aspaiywn () kay tarykha kar ko astamal karnay kay liye yeh akdamat hayn: is tarykha kar kay liye jasws aabjykt kay liye aspaiywn () ka tarykha astamal kryn۔jaswsy ki janay wali is tarykha kar kay liye ayk mkhsawsa rytrn wylyw ko taay karnay kay l And aur is kay astamal karnay kay tarykha kar kay liye kstm par aml draamd fraham karnay kay liye tarykha astamal karnay kay liye ayk mkhsawsa rytrn wylyw ko astamal kryn۔kwnyy ywnt ki janch main aspaiywn () ka tarykha: yeh ('lagh tarykha ko fwn karna chahaiay' ، () => {const logger = testbed.inject (laghghrsrwais) ؛ aspaiywn (laghr ، 'lagh') ؛ ajzaaa.dawswmngh () ؛twka karain (LOGGER.LOG)as kay bad hum nay twka () fnkshn ka astamal is bat ki tsadyk kay liye kya hay keh lagh () ka tarykha kaha gaya tha۔ khlasaha main ، kwnyy ywnt tystngh main aspaiywn () tarykha ayk jasws aabjykt bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo hamain kalwn ko kesi tarykha kar par tryk karnay ki ajazat dyta hay awras kay tarza aml ko tbdyl kryn۔dawylprza kesi tarykha kar kay tarza aml ki janch karnay aur is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye aspaiywn () kay tarykha kar ka astamal krsktay hain aur isy sahayha dlail kay sath blaya gaya tha۔

Question: kwnyy ywnt tystngh main ayktywytr aaؤt astb ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer:
ayktywytr aaؤt astb ayk mzaak aabjykt hay jo kwnyy ywnt tystngh main ayktywytyda raؤt srws ki nkaly karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha aam tawr par un ajzaaa ki janch karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay jo ayktywyt rwt srws aur is kay pyramytrza 123456 par anhasaar karty hayn۔kwnyy ywnt tystngh main ayktywytr aaؤt astb ko kis tarah astamal karnay kay baray main tfsaylat yeh hayn: tyst madaywl ko tshkyl denay kay liye ayk tyst byda۔ kwnsfaighwrytstngh mwdaywl () tarykha bnaiyn aur rwtrststngh mwdawl ko shaml kryn۔ ayk aym aw sy ay aabjykt kay sath ayktywytyt raiwt srws ko awwr raida karnay kay liye ayk tyst byda۔. ayktywytrywt astb.snap shat ko astamal kryn۔ ayktywytr aaؤt astb.snap shat ko astamal kryn۔ampwrt {ajzaaa fkschr ، '@kwnyy/kwr/tystngh' sy Testbed} draamd {ayktywytyda raؤt} sy '@kwnyy/rwtr' ؛ draamd {of 'rxjs' sy '@kwnyy/kwr' sy import draamd {ajzaaa@@@kwnywl/kwr '؛@ajzaaa ({slyktr: 'ayp tyst' ، tymplyt: '

{{id}}

'}) klas tyst kampynt {ID: strngh ؛knstrktr (njy rwt: ayktywytyda rwt) {} ngoninit () {this.route.params.subscribe (pyrams => {this.id = pyrams ['id'] ؛}) ؛}} ki wzuahat ('tystkmpynt' ، () => {jzaw: tyst kampynt: aaiyay fkschr: ajzaaa fkschr ؛ pehlay (() => const ayktywytr aaؤt astb = {asnyp shat: {pyrams: {ID: '123'}}}} ؛ testbed.configuretestingmodule ({aalamyay: [tystkmprynt] ، fraham knndghan: [{fraham kryn: ayktywyt rwt ، ywzaywlw: ayktywytr aaؤt astb}]}) ؛ fkschr = tyst byda۔}) ؛ yeh ('ID ko zaahar karna chahaiay' ، () => {const ansar = prkschr۔ nativelement.queryselector ('p') ؛ twka (ansar.tykwntynt) .tocontain ('123') ؛}) ؛})؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hum nay ayktywytr aaؤt astb ka astamal tyst kay ajzaaa main ayktywytyt rwt srws ki nkaly karnay kay liye kya haay۔ham nay tys byda۔ awwr raiyda prwwaidar () ka tarykha astamal kya hay takha ayk mwk aabjykt kay sath ayktywytyda rwt srws ko awwr raida kya jaskay۔as kay bad hum nay ayktywytr aaؤt astb.snap shat۔ pyrams praprty ko ayktywytyt raؤt srws kay pyramytrza trtyb denay kay liye astamal kya haay۔ un ka khlasaha yeh hay keh ، ayktywytr aaؤt astb ayk mzaak aabjykt hay jo kwnyy ywnt ki janch main ayktywytyda raؤt srws ki nkaly karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔dawylprza ayktywytr aaؤt astb ko un ajzaaa ki janch karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hain jo ayktywytyt raؤt srws aur is kay pyramytrza par mnhasar hayn۔

Question: aap kwnyy ywnt tystngh main ayktywytyda raؤstnp shat klas ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer:

{{id}}

'}) klas tyst kampynt {ID: strngh ؛knstrktr (njy rwt: ayktywytda raؤt ays ayn aay py shat) {} ngoninit () {this.id = this.route.params ['id'] ؛}} byan karain ('tystkmpynt' ، () => {jzaw: tystkmpynt ؛ aaiyay fkschr: ajzaaa fkschr ؛ pehlay (() => const ayktywytda raؤstnp shat = {pyrams: {ID: '123'}} ؛ tyst by۔knfyghrytstngh mwdaywl ({aalamyay: [tystkmpynt] ، fraham knndghan: [{fraham kryn: ayktywytda rwtsnap shat ، yw ays ay wylyw: ayktywytda raؤstnp shat}]}) ؛ fkschr = tyst byda۔ krytkwmypynt (tystkmprynt) ؛ ajzaaa = fkschr daat kampyntns ؛('ID ko dasplay karna chahaiay' ، () => {const ansar = plicure.nativelement.queryselector ('p') ؛ twka (ansar۔ tykst kwntynt) .tocontain ('123') ؛}) ؛ mzakwrha bala main ؛msaal kay tawr par ، hum nay tyst kay kam main ayktywytyda raؤt srws ki nkaly karnay kay liye ayktywytyda raؤstnp shat klas ka astamal kya haay۔ham nay ayk mwk aabjykt kay sath ayktywytyda rwtsnap shat srws ko awwr raida karnay kay liye tyst byda۔ awwr raiyda prwwaidar () ka tarykha astamal kya haay۔as kay bad hum nay tyst byda daat aynjykt () ka tarykha astamal kya hay js main ayktywytyda raؤstnp shat srws ko janch ki jarhay jzaw main anjkshn lghaiyn۔ khlasaha main ، kwnyy ywnt tystngh main ayktywytyda raؤstnp shat klas ko astamal karnay kay liye ، hamain ayktywytyda rwtsnap shat klas ko draamd karnay ki zurwrt hay ، ayktywytyda raؤt ays ayn aay py ays ty klas ki ayk msaal bnaiyn۔zurwry khsawsayat kay sath ، tyst madaywl ki tshkyl karain aur rwtrststngh mwdawl ko shaml karain ، tys byda daat awwr raida prwwaidar () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey mwk aabjykt kay sath ayktywytyda rwtsnap shat srws ko awwr raida karain ، aur tyst byda daat anjykt () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey tyst kyay janay waly ajzaaa main ayktywytyda rwts np shat srws ko anjykshn kryn۔dawylprza ayktywytyda raؤstnap shat klas ko ajzaaa ki janch karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hain jo ayktywytyt rwt srws aur is kay pyramytrza par anhasaar karty hayn۔

Question: kwnyy ywnt tystngh main pehlay aur byfwryl kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: is sy pehlay aur byfwryl kwnyy ywnt tystngh main laif saiykl kay tarykay hain jo tystwn kay liye mahawl ko trtyb denay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔phalay aur pehlay sy pehlay kay darmiyan akhtlafat yeh hayn: pehlay sy pehlay ka tarykha byan blak main hr tyst sy pehlay kaha jata hay js main isy 1234 kaha jata haay۔ hr tyst kay liye mahawl ko trtyb denay kay liye pehlay ka tarykha astamal kya jata hay ، jesay tyst dayta bnana ya anhasaar 1234 ko shrwa krna۔phalay ka tarykha yeh ykyny bnanay kay liye mfyd hay keh hr tyst saaf sthra mahawl main chlaya jata hay aur yeh keh pchhlay tyst 1234 sy koi zumny asarat nahin hawtay hayn۔byan krdha blak main mwjwd tamam tystwn kay liye mahawlyat ko trtyb denay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jesay dayta bys knkshn ko shrwa karna ya braay dayta syt 356 ko lwda krna۔ byfwryl ka tarykha kar tyst kay liye syt ap kay wkt ko kam karnay kay liye mfyd hay jo ayk hi mahawlyat 356.1 main ، pehlay aur pehlay hi mshtrkha tawr par hawta haay۔byfwryl kwnyy ywnt tystngh main laif saiykl kay tarykay hain jo tystwn kay liye mahawl kaim karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔byan krdha blak main hr tyst sy pehlay pehlay kaha jata hay aur hr tyst kay liye mahawlyat ko trtyb denay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، jabky byan krdha blak main kesi bhi tyst sy pehlay byfwryl ko ayk bar blaya jata hay aur is ko byan blak main mwjwd tamam tystwn kay liye mahawl kaim karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dawylpr un tarykwn ko is bat ka ykyn karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hain keh un kay tyst saaf sthra mahawl main chl rahay hain aur pchhlay tystwn sy koi zumny asarat nahin hayn۔

Question: aap kwnyy ywnt tystngh main ajzaaa fkstwraؤtwdaytykt hakmt amly ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer:
kwnyy ywnt tystngh main ajzaaa fkstwrytwrytwtytykt hakmt amly ko astamal karnay kay l we ، hum un mrahal par aml krsktay hayn: @kwnyy/kwr/tystngh sy ajzaaa fkstwrytwrytyt syt ko draamd kryn۔ tyst byda ko astamal kryn۔.createcompient () ayk ajzaaa ki hakykt pyda karnay ka tarykha۔ ajzaaa fkschr astamal kryn۔ aawtwdaytykt chynjza () khud kar tarykay sy tbdyly ka ptha lghanay kay liye tarykha kar ka tarykha۔ yahan kwnywlr ywnt ki alamt main ajzaaa fkstwryatwdaytykt hakmt amly ko astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: draamd {ajzaaa fkstwr aatatwdayt ،@anghlwlr/@kwnstr fkstwraatwdaytykt ، tyst byda}kwr/tystngh ''@@kwnyy/kwr 'say draamd {ajzaaa@@jzaw ({slyktr:' ayp tyst '، tymplyt:'

{{pygham}}

'}) klas tyst kampynt {pygham = 'haylw ، dnya!' ؛ap dayt mysyj () {this.message = 'haylw ، kwnyy!' ؛}} ki wzuahat ('tystkmpynt' ، () => {jzaw: tyst kampynt: aaiyay fkschr: ajzaaa fkschr ؛ pehlay (() => {tyst byda.kwnfyghwrytstngh mwdawl ({aalamyha: [tyst ajzaaa] ، fraham knndha: [{fraham karnay walay: [{fraham karnay walay:ajzaaa fkstwryatwdaytykt ، usevalue: true}]}) ؛ hakykt = testbed.createcompient (tyst kampynt) ؛ ajzaaa = fkschr.astfsar slyktr ('p') ؛ twka (ansar۔ tykst kant)= plicure.nativelement.querySelector ('p') ؛ twka (ansar.tykst kwntynt) .tocontain ('haylw ، kwnyy!') ؛}) ؛}) ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hum nay khud kar tarykay sy tbdyly ko kabl bnanay kay liye ajzaaa fkstwrytwtytykt hakmt amly ka astamal kya haay۔tyst kay ajzaaa main ptha lghana۔ham nay tyst madaywl ko tshkyl denay kay liye testbed.configuretestingmodule () ka tarykha astamal kya hay aur is main ajzaaa fkstwraؤtwdaytyt srws shaml haay۔as kay bad hum nay ayk jzaw ki hakykt aur ajzaaa fkschr bnanay kay liye tyst byda۔ krytkmpmnt () ka tarykha astamal kya haay۔ khwdkar tbdyly ka ptha lghanay kay l aut ، aawtwdaytykt chynjza () ka tarykha kar ، kwnyy ywnt ki janch main ajzaaa fkstwr aatwwdaytykt ki hakmt amly ko astamal karnay kay liye ، hamain ajzaaa fkstwr aatatwdaytykt srws ko draamd karnay ki zurwrt haay۔، tyst madaywl ko tshkyl dyn aur ajzaaa fkstwrytw daytykt srws ko shaml karain ، tyst byda۔ krytkwmypynt () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ayk jzaw ki hakykt bnaiyn ، aur ajzaaa fkschr.aywtwdaytyktchynjs () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey khud kar tarykay sy tbdyly ka ptha lghanay ko faal kryn۔dawylprza hr tyst kay maamlay main kalngh daykt chynjza () sy bchnay kay liye ajzaaa fkstwrytw aatatykt hakmt amly ka astamal krsktay hain aur is bat ko ykyny bna saktay hain keh un kay ajzaaa sahayha tarykay sy brtaؤ kryn۔

Question: kwnyy ywnt tystngh main ngzone.runoutsideangular () tarykha kar ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kwnyy ywnt tystngh main ngzone.runoutsideangular () tarykha kwnywlr zawn sy bahar afaal chlanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔as sy hamain aysa kam anjam denay ki ajazat mlty hay jo kwnyy tbdyly ka ptha lghanay ko mthark nahin krta hay ya kwnyy ki ghltay ko hayndalngh 12 kay taba haay۔yhaan ngzone.runoutsideangular () tarykha astamal karnay kay tarykha kar kay baray main tfsaylat hayn: @kwnyy/kwr sy ngzone srws draamd kryn۔ tyst byda ko astamal kryn۔() ayn jy zawn srws ko janchnay waly ajzaaa main anjykshn lghanay ka tarykha'@@kwnyy/kwr/tystngh' sy test tyst byda@@@kwnyy/kwr 'say ampwrt {ngzone} byan karain (' tystkmpynt '، () => {ngzone: ngzone ؛ pehlay (() => {tyst byda۔knfyghrytstngh mwdaywl ({fraham knndghan: [ngzone]}) ؛ ngzone = testbed.inject (ngzone) ؛}) ؛ yeh ('kwnyy \' s zawn '، () => {ngzone = 0 ؛ ngzone kay bahar fnkshn ko chlana chahaiay۔.runoutsideangular (() => {syt taim aaؤt (() => {wylyw = 1 ؛} ، 1000) ؛}) ؛ syt taim aaؤt (() => {twka (kymt) .tobe (1) ؛} ، 2000) ؛}) ؛}) ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hum nay ngzone.runoutsideangular () ka tarykha astamal kya hay takha kwnyy kay zawn sy bahar kesi fnkshn ko chlaiyn۔ham nay ayk mtzuad kam ki nkaly karnay kay liye syt taim aaؤt () fnkshn ka astamal kya hay jo 1 syknda kay bad wylyw mtghyr ko taay krta haay۔as kay bad hum nay tyst main syt taim aaؤt () fnkshn ka astamal is bat ki tsadyk kay liye kya hay keh wylyw mtghyr ko 2 syknda kay bad sahayha tawr par trtyb diya gaya haay۔ khlasaha main ، kwnyy ywnt ki janch main ngzone.runoutsideangular () tarykha kwnyy kay zawn sy bahar afaal ko chlanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔dawylprza is tarykha kar ko kam anjam denay kay liye astamal krsktay hain jo kwnyy tbdyly ka ptha lghanay ko mthark nahin krta hay ya kwnyy ki ghltay sy nmtnay kay taba haay۔

Question: kwnyy ywnt tystngh main aap tyst byda۔ awwr raiyda prwwydar tarykha ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy ywnt tystngh main tyst byda۔tyst byda ko astamal karnay kay liye akdamat yeh hayn۔ awwr raiyda prwwaidar () tarykha: tyst madaywl ko tshkyl denay kay liye tyst byda۔ kwnsfaighwrytstngh mwdawl () tarykha astamal kryn۔ayk jzaw ki hakykt ko bnanay kay liye tyst byda۔@kwnyy/kwr/tystngh '؛ ampwrt {mysrwais} say' ./my.service '؛ import {mymockservice} mnjanb') => {testbed.configuretestingmodule ({fraham knndghan: [mysrwais]}) ؛}) ؛ yeh ('mzaak ki khdmt ka astamal karna chahaiay' ، () => test tyst byda۔ awwr raiyda prwwaidar (mysrwys ، {astamal: nyw maiy maksrwais ()})const const CONGENTEFIXTURE = testbed.createcompient (mycompointe) ؛ const const ajzaaa = ajzaaa fkschr.twka karain (ajzaaa۔}) ؛}) ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hum nay mysrwais fraham karnay waly ko mzaak aabjykt kay sath awwr raida karnay kay liye tyst byda۔ awwr raiyda prwwaidar () tarykha astamal kya haay۔as kay bad hum nay ayk jzaw ki hakykt ko bnanay kay liye tyst byda۔ krytkwmpynt () ka tarykha astamal kya hay aur ajzaaa ki janch pratal kay l con ajzaaa fkschr۔ayk mzaak aabjykt ya mkhtlf aml draamd۔dawylprza is tarykha kar ko un ajzaaa ki janch karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hain jo khdmat par anhasaar karty hain aur is bat ko ykyny bnatay hain keh woh sahayha tarykay sy brtaؤ kryn۔

Question: kwnyy ywnt tystngh main tyst byda۔ krytkwmypynt aur tyst byda daat kampylkmpwnts kay tarykwn main kya frk haay؟

Question: aap kwnyy ywnt tystngh main HTTPClientTestingModule kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy ywnt tystngh main HTTPClientStingModule astamal karnay kay l we ، hum un akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: @kwnyy/aam/HTTP/tystngh sy HTTPClientTestingModule aur Httptestingcontroller draamd kryn۔ tystnghtnghtngh mydaymwdawl () tyst madaywl ki tshkyl kay liye tarykha kar ko shaml kryn۔testbed.inject () HTTPClient srws ko janchnay waly jzaw main anjykshn karnay ka tarykha۔ HTTPTESTINGCONTROLLER.EXPECTONE () HTTP drkhwast ko rwknay aur mzaak ka jwab fraham karnay kay liye tarykha astamal kryn۔ HTTPTESTINGCONTROLLER.VERIFE () ka tarykha yeh ykyny bnanay kay liye nahin hay keh koi nahin haaybkaya HTTP ki drkhwastyn۔ yahan kwnyy ywnt tystngh main HTTPClientTestingModule astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: '@kwnyy/kwr/tystngh' sy draamd {Testbed} ampwrt {HTTPClientTestingModule ، HttptestingController} sy '@kwnghwl/mshtrkha/HTTP/tystngh' sy '{mysrwais} mnjanb '، fraham knndghan: [mysrwais]}) ؛khdmt = testbed.inject (MyService) ؛httpmock = testbed.inject (httptestingController) ؛}) ؛atherail (() => {httpmock.verify () ؛}) ؛yha ('aadad wa shmar ki ayk saf ko waps karna chahaiay' ، () => {const mockdata = [{id: 1 ، nam: 'jan'} ، {ID: 2 ، nam: 'jyn'}] ؛ srws.ght dayta ().subscribe (dayta => {twka (dayta. lmbaiy)) ؛ twka (req.request.method) .tobe ('get') ؛ Req.flush (MockData) ؛}) ؛}) ؛ mzakwrha msaal main ، hum nay HTTPClientStingModule aur HttptestingController astamal kya hay takha main HTTP ki drkhwast ka mzaak araaiyn۔mysrwaisham nay tyst madaywl ko tshkyl denay kay liye tyst by ay day۔ kwkwrytstngh mwdawl () ka tarykha astamal kya hay aur HTTPClientTestingModule ko shaml kya haay۔as kay bad hum nay HTTPTESTINGCONTROLLER.EXPECTONE () ka tarykha astamal kya hay takha HTTP drkhwast ko rwkyn aur mzaak ka jwab fraham kya jaskay۔ham nay HTTPTESTINGCONTROLLER.verify () tarykha astamal kya hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh HTTP ki koi bkaya drkhwastyn mwjwd nahin hayn۔ khlasaha ، kwnyy ywnt ki janch main HTTPCLIENTTESTINGMODULE ko astamal karnay kay liye ، hamain HTTPClientStingModule ko draamd karnay ki zurwrt hay aur HTTPTESTINGMODULE aur HTTPTESTINGCONTROLE ko shaml karnay ki zurwrt hay aur HTTTPTESTINGCORTER aur HTTTPTESTINGCONTROLE ko shaml karain aur HTTTPTESTINGMODULE ko bhi shaml kryn۔HTTPClient srws ko tyst by ay day daat aynjykt () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey janchnay waly jzaw main anjykshn karain ، aych ty ty py ki drkhwast ko rwkyn aur HTTPTESTINGCONTROLLER.EXPECTONE () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ayk mzaak ka jwab fraham karain ، aur is bat ko ykyny bnaiyn keh HTTPTESTINGCONTRORLER.Verify ka astamal karty hoey HTTP ki koi bkaya drkhwastyn mwjwd nahin hayn۔() tarykhadawylprza un tarykwn ko apnay kwnyy ywnt tystwn main HTTP ki drkhwastwn ka mzaak araanay kay liye astamal krsktay hain aur is bat ko ykyny bnasktay hain keh un kay ajzaaa aur khdmat sahayha tarykay sy brtaؤ kryn۔

Question: kwnyy ywnt tystngh main rwtrstngh mwdawl ka mksad kya haay؟

() tarykha kar ko shaml karnay ka tarykha aur rwtr tstngh mwdawl shaml kryn۔ tyst byda astamal kryn۔ krytkwmypynt () ayk jzaw ki hakykt pyda karnay kay liye tarykha kar bnaiyn۔ ajzaaa ki tshkyl ka hakyktpickure.detectchanges () ؛}) ؛yha ('bnana chahaiay' ، () => {twka (jzaw) .tobetruthy () ؛}) ؛yha ('daysh bwrda par tshryf la jana chahaiay' ، () => {const btn = prkschr۔ nativelement.queryselector ('btn') ؛ btn.klk () ؛ twka (ajzaaa.rwtr.nwyghyt)']) ؛}) ؛}) ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hum nay maikmpmnt ko janchnay kay liye rwtr tstngh mwdawl ka astamal kya haay۔ham Question: aap kwnyy ywnt tystngh main jasmine.createspyobj tarykha kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy ywnt tystngh main jysmyn۔yha tarykha karaamd hay jab hum kesi aysay jzaw ya khdmt ki janch karna chahti hain jo dusray ajzaaa ya khdmat par mnhasar haw۔ham anhasaar kay l a ayk mzaak aabjykt bnanay kay liye jasmine.createspyobj () ka astamal krsktay hain aur is ko jzaw ya khdmt ko janchnay kay liye mhaya krsktay hayn۔ yahan jysmyn۔ krytyswbj () tarykha astamal karnay kay akdamat hayn: jysmyn kwr sy jysmyn laibryry draamd kryn۔ayk ya ayk sy zayada tarykwn kay sath mzaak aabjykt bnanay kay liye jysmyn۔ krytyspyw by jay () ka tarykha astamal kryn۔ tyst byda ko astamal kryn۔prkchr۔ ajzaaa ka astamal kryn۔'@@kwnyy/kwr/tystngh' sy test tyst byda {ampwrt {mycompident} mnjanb '.aaiyay mysrwysspy: jasmine.spyobj <Myservice> ؛ pehlay (() => {myservicesspy = jasmine.createspyobj ('Myservice' ، ['getData']) ؛testbed.configuretestingmodule ({aalamyha: [mycompointe] ، fraham knndghan: [{fraham kryn: mysrwais ، ywzawlyw: mysrwysspy}]}) ؛hakykt = testbed.createcompient (mycompointer) ؛ajzaaa = hakykt}) ؛yha ('getData tarykha ko fwn karna chahaiay' ، () => {myservicesspy.getData.and.returnvalue (([1 ، 2 ، 3])) ؛ ajzaaa.anghwnyt () ؛ twka twka (mysrwysyspy daat ghyt dayta)) ؛}) ؛}) ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hum nay JASMINE.CREATESPYOBJ () ka tarykha astamal kya hay takha mysrwais anhasaar kay liye ayk mzaak aabjykt tyar kya jaskay۔as kay bad hum nay tyst madaywl ko tshkyl denay aur mzaak aabjykt ko shaml karnay kay liye testbed.configuretestingmodule () ka tarykha astamal kya haay۔ham nay jzaw ki hakykt ko bnanay kay liye tyst by ay day۔ krytkwmpynt () ka tarykha astamal kya hay aur jzaw ki janch ki janay wali jzaw tak rsaiy haasal karnay kay liye ajzaaa fkschr۔ham nay MOCK aabjykt kay ghyt dayta kay tarykha kar par jaswsy kay liye aspaiywn () ka tarykha astamal kya haay۔dawylprza is tarykha kar ko kesi aysay ajzaaa ya khdmt ki janch karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hain jo dusray ajzaaa ya khdmat par mnhasar hawta haay۔

Answer: kwnyy main srws srws ayk aysy klas hay jo saarf kay antrfys 123 sy alag prt main karwbary mntak aur dayta hayra phyry kay liye astamal hawty haay۔ srwsza ko faalyt fraham karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo ayk ayply kyshn 123 main mtadd ajzaaa main shyir kya jaskta haay۔anhasaar anjykshn 123 ka astamal karty hoey dyghr khdmat۔ kwnyy main prwwidara fraham knndha ayk srws 1345 bnanay ka ayk nskhha haay۔ prwwaidarza ko khdmat ki tshkyl kay liye astamal kya jata hay aur inhain ayply kyshn 1345 main ajzaaa kay liye dstyab karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔fnkshn ya klas 45. prwwaidarza ko drkhwast main mkhtlf stahawn par rjstr kya jaskta hay ، jesay jzaw ki staha par ya madaywl ki staha par 135.in smry main ، ayk khdmt aur kwnyy main fraham knndha kay darmiyan bnyady frk yeh hay keh ayk khdmt ayk klas hay jo ayk klas haaykarwbary mntak aur dayta main hayra phyry ko ankast krta hay ، jabky fraham knndha khdmt bnanay ka ayk nskhha haay۔khdmat ko faalyt fraham karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo mtadd ajzaaa main shyir ki jaskty hay ، jabky fraham knndghan ko khdmat ki tshkyl kay liye astamal kya jata hay aur inhain ayply kyshn main ajzaaa kay liye dstyab bnatay hayn۔

Question: aap kwnywlr main @awpnshnl daykwrytr ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy main @aapshnl daykwrytr ka astamal is bat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye kya jata hay keh anhasaar akhtyary hay aur agar yeh anhasaar nahin dahwnda sakta hay tou kwnyy ko kaladm waps karna chahaiay۔@aapshnl daykwrytr ko astamal karnay kay liye yeh akdamat hayn: @kwnyy/kwr sy akhtyary daykwrytr draamd kryn۔ knstrktr main anhasaar ko sjanay kay liye @aapshnl daykwrytr ka astamal kryn۔ tyst byda ko astamal kryn۔anhasaar۔ jzaw ki hakykt ko bnanay kay liye tyst byda۔ krytkwmpynt () ka tarykha astamal kryn۔ ajzaaa fkschr ko astamal kryn۔/kwr/tystngh '؛ ampwrt {akhtyary} say'@kwnyy/kwr '؛ draamd {mysrwais} say'.{aghr (this.myservice) {as ko waps kryn۔} else {wapsy NULL ؛}}} byan karain ('mycompointe' ، () => {jzaw: mycompointe ؛ aaiyay fkschr: ajzaaa fkschr <mycompocent> ؛ pehlay (() => {testbed.configuretestingmodule ({aalamyha: [mycompedent] ، fraham knndghan: [asrarwais]}) ؛ fkschr = tyst byda۔ krytkwmpynt (maikmpmnt) ؛ ajzaaa = fkschr daat kampynt un astyns ؛}) ؛ yeh (aghr khdmt fraham nahin ki hogi hay tou 'kaladm ko lwtana chahaiay' ، () => {twka (jzaw۔() ؛}) ؛ yeh (aghr khdmt fraham ki hogi hay tou 'ghyt dayta kay tarykha kar ko fwn karna chahaiay' ، () => {kwnt mysrwais = tyst byda daat anjykt (mysrwais) ؛ aspaiywn (mysrwais ، 'ghyt dayta')۔1 ، 2 ، 3]) ؛ twka (ajzaaa.dawswmngh ())mysrwais anhasaar akhtyary haay۔as kay bad hum nay tyst madaywl ko tshkyl denay kay liye testbed.configuretestingmodule () ka tarykha astamal kya hay aur is main mysrwais anhasaar shaml kya haay۔ham nay jzaw ki hakykt ko bnanay kay liye tyst byda۔ krytkwmpynt () ka tarykha astamal kya hay aur ajzaaa fkschr۔aghr anhasaar nahin mil sakta hay tou kaladm waps lwtyn۔dawylpr is sjawt ko rn taim ghltaywn ko rwknay kay liye astamal krsktay hain jab kuch mwad ghaib ho ya sahayha tawr par rjstrda nah haw۔

Question: kwnyy main NGModulefactoryloader srws ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kwnyy main NGModulefactoryloader srws kwnyy ayply kyshn main sst bhry hui madaywlza ko lwda karnay aur anstyt karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔yha kwnyy frym wrk kay anhasaar anjykshn sstm ka ayk klydy hasaha hay aur rwtr kay zaryaha dakhly tawr par astamal hawta hay jab zurwrt pranay par sst bwjh madaywlza kay liay۔yhaan NGModulefactoryloader srws kay baray main kuch aham nkat hayn: NGModulefactoryLoader rn taim 1 par ayk madaywl fyktry ko mthark tawr par lwda karnay kay liye ayk tarykha kar mhaya krta haay۔ yeh kwnyy ko madaywl ki lwdangh ko mwkhr karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jab tak keh is ki hakykt main zurwrt nah ho ، bjaiay is kay keh is ko baky ayply kyshn 1 kay sath pysh kryn۔NGModulefactoryloader kwnywlr 1 main sst bhry hui madaywlza ko lwda karnay aur anstyt karnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krkay kam krta haay۔ NGModulefactoryLoader ko dakhly tawr par rwtr kay zaryaha sst bwjh kay madaywlza kay zaryaha astamal kya jata haay۔، kwnyy main NGModulefactoryloader srws kwnyy ayply kyshn main sst bhry hui madaywlza ko lwda karnay aur tyza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔yha rn taim kay wkt ayk madaywl fyktry ko mthark tawr par lwda karnay kay liye ayk tarykha kar mhaya krta hay ، jo kwnyywlr ko madaywl ki lwdangh ko mwkhr karnay ki ajazat dyta hay jab tak keh is ki hakykt main zurwrt nah haw۔ngmodulefactoryloader ko dakhly tawr par rwtr kay zaryaha sst bwjh kay madaywlza kay liye astamal kya jata hay jab zurwrt ho aur kwnyy frym wrk kay anhasaar anjykshn sstm ka hasaha hawta haay۔

Question: aap kwnywlr main rwtr mwdal.fwrwrwt () tarykha kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy main rwtr mwdal۔ fwrwrwt () ka tarykha kesi ayply kyshn kay liye rwt rwtngh madaywl ko tshkyl denay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yhaan rwtr mwdaywl astamal karnay kay akdamat hayn۔ fwrwrwt () tarykha: @kwnyy/raؤtr sy rwtr mwdal aur rastwn ko draamd kryn۔ rwts srny ka astamal karty hoey ayply kyshn kay rastwn ki wzuahat kryn۔ rwtrmwdawl ka astamal kryn۔ayply kyshn kay l .۔ rwtr mwdalwl۔ fwrda () ka astamal kryn۔'@kwnyy/kwr' sy {ngmodule} draamd {routerModule ، '@kwnyy/raؤtr' sy rwts} import draamd {hawmwmpynt} sy '.kay baray main daat kam '؛ kwnt rwts: rwts = [{rastha:' '، jzaw: ghhrylw ajzaaa} ، {rastha:' kay baray main '، ajzaaa: kay baray main kamypynt}]@ngmodule ({draamdat: [routermodule.forroot (rwts)] ،braamdat: [raؤtr mwdal]}) mndrjha bala msaal kay tawr par ، hum nay rwtrmwdawl.fwrwt () tarykha astamal kya hay takha hum drkhwast kay liye rwt rwtngh madaywl ko tshkyl dyn۔ham nay rwts srny ka astamal karty hoey drkhwast kay rastwn ki wzuahat ki haay۔ham nay rwtr lnk lnk hadayt ko astamal kya haay۔dawylprza is tarykha kar ko astamal kay l the rastwn ki wzuahat kay liye astamal krsktay hain aur rwtr lnk lnk hadayt ko rastwn kay darmiyan nywyghyt karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: askrpt tyghza main ASYNC aur Defer safat main kya frk haay؟
Answer: async attributethe async antsab ayk bwlyn wsaf hay js ki nshandhay karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh askrpt ko asynchronously1234 par aml draamd kya jana chahaiay۔ jab kesi askrpt ko Async kay nam sy nshan zad kya jata hay ، tou is ko daaؤn lwda karty hi is par aml draamd kya jaye ga ، baghair safhaha 1234 ki pysh ksh ko blak kyay۔wsaf askrpt kay liye mfyd hay jo dusray askrpt ya DOM1234 par anhasaar nahin karty hayn۔ ASYNC antsab askrpt 1234 par aml draamd kay hakm ki zumant nahin dyta haay۔as safhaay ko parsngh 1234 khtm karnay kay bad۔ jab askrpt ko dayfr kay tawr par nshan zad kya jata hay tou ، is ko mkml tawr par tamyr hony kay bad is par aml draamd kya jaye ga ، lekin is sy pehlay keh dawmkwntlwda aywnt ko brtarf krdya jaiay۔.yha dayfl wsaf askrpt 1234.in kay khlasaay kay aml kay hakm ki zumant dyta hay ، askrpt tyghza main ASYNC aur dayfr awsaaf ka astamal parsr blak karnay wali jawa askrpt ko khtm karnay aur wyb pyj ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ASYNC wsaf ka astamal is bat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye kya jata hay keh askrpt ko snjydghy sy aml main laya jana chahaiay ، jabky dayfr wsaf ka astamal is bat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye kya jata hay keh safhaha ki tjzayha khtm hony kay bad askrpt ko aml main laya jana chahaiay۔ASYNC wsaf askrpts kay liye mfyd hay jo dusray askrpt ya dawm par anhasaar nahin karty hain ، jabky mwkhr altwaa askrpt kay liye mfyd hay jo dusray askrpt ya dawm par mnhasar haay۔dayfr wsaf askrpt par aml draamd kay hakm ki zumant dyta hay ، jabky ASYNC wsaf askrpt par aml draamd kay hakm ki zumant nahin dyta haay۔

Question: "[rwtr lnk] =" "['/path' ، {pyrm: wylyw}]" "awr [rwtr lnk] =" "['/path' ، pyrm ، wylyw]" "kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟"

Question: kwnywlr rwtngh main aap kwiyr pyramshyndalngh praprty kay sath aap rwtr۔ nywyghyt () tarykha kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main raؤtr۔ nywyghyt () tarykha kar prwghram kay lhaaza sy ayk mkhtlf rwt par tshryf la janay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔astfsar pyramshyndalngh praprty ko yeh btanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh jab kesi mkhtlf rastay par tshryf latay wkt astfsar kay pyramytrza ko hayndal kya jaiay۔astfsar pyra myshyndalngh praprty kay sath rwtr۔ nywyghyt () tarykha astamal karnay kay pyramytrza ko kis tarah snbhalnay ka tarykha yeh btanay kay liye astfsar pyra myshyndalngh praprty ko 'anzumam' ya 'mhafwza' karnay kay liye syt kryn۔ yahan astfsar pyram shyndangh praprty kay sath rwtr۔ nywyghyt () kay tarykha kar ko astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay۔kwnyy rwtngh myn: '@kwnyy/kwr' sy {ajzaaa} draamd {rwtr@'@kwnyy/rwtr' sy draamd kryn@@ajzaaa ({slyktr: 'ayp msaal' ، tymplyt: ؛this.router.navigate (['/msaal'] ، {astfsar pyrmza ، astfsar pyram shyndalngh: 'zum'}) ؛}} mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hum nay jzaw main @kwnyy/rwtr sy rwtr klas draamd kya haay۔ham nay jzaw kay knstrktr main rwtr klas anjkshn lghaya haay۔ham nay URL tabkat ki ayk saf aur astfsar pyramytrza ki ayk chyza kay sath rwtr.nwyghyt () tarykha ko blaya haay۔ham nay astfsar pyramytrza ko mwjwdha astfsar pyramytrza kay sath zum karnay kay liye 'zum' karnay kay liye kwiry pyra mysyndalngh praprty ka tayn kya haay۔ajzaaa main kwnyy/rwtr ، jzaw kay knstrktr main rwtr klas anjykshn lghaiyn ، URL tabkat ki ayk saf aur astfsar pyramytrza ki ayk chyza kay sath raؤtr۔ nywyghyt () kay tarykha kar ko kal karain ، aur astfsar pyramshyndalngh praprty ko 'anzumam' par syt karain '۔astfsar kay pyramytrza ko kis tarah snbhalnay ka tarykha btanay kay liye mhafwza karain

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main askyplwkyshn chynj aur is ki jghha lenay kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main askyplwkyshn chynj aur is ki jghha la lytay hayn۔an dono kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: askyplwkyshn chynjtay askyplwkyshn chynj praprty ko braؤzar ki tarykh 123 main niay yw aar ayl ko shaml kyay baghair kesi mkhtlf rastay par tshryf la janay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ askyplwkyshn chynj praprty mfyd hay jab dawylprza ko mwjwdha yw aar ayl main mwjwdha yw aar ayl ko tbdyl kyay baghair kesi mkhtlf rastay par tshryf la janay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔braؤzar ki tarykh 123۔ askyplwkyshn chynj praprty nywyghyshn aykstras aabjykt ka ayk aapshn hay jo raؤtr ko mntkl kya jata haay۔ nywyghyt () tarykha 13. ry plysr lytwrl praprty ko kesi mkhtlf rastay par janay aur braؤzar ki tarykh main mwjwdha yw aar ayl ko nyw yw aar ayl 123 kay sath tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔praprty mfyd hay jab dawylprza ko kesi mkhtlf rastay par tshryf la janay aur braؤzar ki tarykh main mwjwdha URL ko niay URL123 kay sath tbdyl karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ ryplyswrl praprty nywyghyshn aykstras aabjykt ka ayk aapshn hay jo rwtr ko mntkl kya jata haay۔kwnyy rwtngh main askyplwkyshn chynj aur is ki jghha la lytay hayn۔askyplwkyshn chynj praprty ko braؤzar ki tarykh main niay yw aar ayl ko shaml kyay baghair kesi mkhtlf rastay par janay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky ryplyswrl praprty ko kesi mkhtlf rastay par janay aur braؤzar ki tarykh main mwjwdha yw aar ayl ko niay url.1stackoverflow2ligtututurialshub kay sath tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: aap kwnyy rwtngh main ayk sy zayada mhaafzawn kay sath kynlwda gharda antrfys ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main ayk sy zayada mhaafzawn kay sath kynlwda gharda antrfys ka astamal karnay kay liye ، dawylprza un mrahal par aml pyra hawsktay hayn: ayk niy klas bnaiyn jo kynlwda antrfys ko nafza kray۔ klas main kynlwda () kay tarykha kar ko nafza kryn۔sst bwjh waly madaywl ko lwda karnay ka tarza aml۔ niy klas ko sst bwjh waly madaywl ki kynlwda praprty ki kymt kay tawr par pysh kryn۔ ayk sy zayada mhaafzawn ko lyzay lwdada madaywl ki kyn lwda praprty main mntkl karnay kay liye ayk saf ka astamal kryn۔ is ki ayk msaal haay۔kwnyy rwtngh main ayk sy zayada mhaafzawn kay sath kynlwda gharda antrfys ka astamal: '@kwnyy/kwr' sy draamd {anjykshn {ampwrt {kynlwda ، rwt@'@kwnyy/rwtr' sy rwt@@anjykshn aybl () aykspwrt klas kstm kynlwda gharda kay awzaar kyn lwda (rwt rwt rwt: rwt): bwlyn {// apni mntak ki wzuahat yahan sch waps kryn۔}} mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hum nay ayk niy klas tshkyl di hay jo kynlwda antrfys ko nafza krty haay۔ham nay klas main kynlwda () ka tarykha kar nafza kya haay۔ham nay sst bwjh waly madaywl ko lwda karnay kay tarza aml ko kntrwl karnay kay liye kynlwda () kay tarykha kar kay liye mntak ki wzuahat ki haay۔ham nay niy klas ko sst bhry hui madaywl ki kynlwda praprty ko kymt kay tawr par fraham kya haay۔ lyzay lwdada madaywl ki kyn lwda praprty kay sath mtadd ghardaza ka astamal karnay kay liye ، dawylprza mhaafzawn ko praprty ko mntkl karnay kay liye ayk saf ka astamal krsktay hayn: kanst rwts: rwts = [{rastha: 'sst' ، lwdachnyn: () => draamd ('./ sst/sst.mwdawl')mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hum nay ayk sy zayada mhaafzawn ko sst bwjh waly madaywl ki kynlwda praprty par mntkl karnay kay liye ayk saf ka astamal kya haay۔ khlasaha۔antrfys ، klas main kynlwda () kay tarykha kar ko nafza karain ، sst bwjh waly madaywl ko lwda karnay kay tarza aml ko kntrwl karnay kay liye kynlwda () kay tarykha kar kay l the mntak ki wzuahat karain ، niy klas ko kahal sy bhray hoey madaywl ki kyn lwda praprty ko kymt kay tawr par fraham kryn۔، aur ayk sy zayada ghardaza ko lyzay lwdada madaywl ki kyn lwda praprty par mntkl karnay kay liye ayk saf ka astamal kryn۔

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main rwtr lnkyktyw apshnza antrfys ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main raؤtr lnkyktyw aapshn antrfys ka astamal rwtr lnkyktyw hadayt kay tarza aml ko tshkyl denay kay liye kya jata haay۔raؤtr lnkykty ayktyw apshnza kay baray main kuch aham nkat yeh hayn: rwtr lnk ayktywyktywyshnza @kwnyy/raؤtr pykyj main ayk antrfys hay jo rwtr lnkyktyw daairyktyw 12 kay akhtyarat ki wzuahat krta haay۔ raؤtr lnkyktyw aapshnza ko rwtr lnkyktyw pyts kay tarza aml ko trtyb denay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔sy ays ays klasza ansar par laghw hony kay liye jab lnk faal haay۔kwnyy rwtngh main antrfys rwtr lnkyktyw hadayt kay tarza aml ko tshkyl denay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔jb lnk faal hawta hay aur is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye keh aya koi lnk faal hay tou dawylprza sy ays ays klaswn ki wzuahat karnay kay liye rwtr lnkyktyw aapshnza ka astamal krsktay hayn۔jb dawylprza ko rwtr lnkyktyw daairyktyw kay tarza aml ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay ki zurwrt hawty hay tou rwtr lnkyktyw aapshnza mfyd hayn۔

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main akhtyary pyramytrza kay sath aap pyramytraizada rwt nhaw ko kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer:
kwnyy rwtngh main akhtyary pyramytrza kay sath pyramytraizada rwt nhaw ko astamal karnay kay liye ، dawylpr un akdamat par aml pyra hawsktay hayn: akhtyary pyramytr kay sath rastay kay rastay ki wzuahat kryn: pyramytr ka nam aur is kay bad alamt ka astamal karty hawiay؟alamt is bat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye keh pyramytr akhtyary haay۔ rastay aur kesi bhi dusri khsawsayat kay sath rwt ki trtyb ki wzuahat kryn۔ ayktywytyt rwt srws ka astamal karty hoey jzaw main akhtyary pyramytr۔ kwjaty rwtngh main akhtyary pyramytrza kay sath pyramytraizada rwt nhaw ko astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay:kanst rwts: rwts = [{rastha: 'msaal/: ID؟' ، jzaw: msaal kay tawr pr}] ؛ mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hum nay akhtyary pyramytr ID kay sath rastay kay rastay ki wzuahat ki hay js ka astamal karty hawiay: pyramytr ka nam aur is kay bad alamt؟alamt is bat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye keh pyramytr akhtyary haay۔ham nay rastay aur msaal kay tawr par jzaw kay jzaw main akhtyary pyramytr tak rsaiy kay liye rwt ki trtyb ki wzuahat ki haay۔'@kwnyy/raؤtr' ؛@ajzaaa ({slyktr: 'ayp msaal' ، tymplyt: `

akhtyary pyramytr: {{ID}}

` `) aykspwrt klas ki msaal kay tawr par aml ki msaal kay tawr par awnt {ID: strngh ؛knstrktr (njy rwt: ayktywytyda rwt) {} ngoninit () {this.id = this.route.snapshot.parammap.get ('id') ؛}} mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hum nay jzaw main @kwnyy/rwtr sy ayktywyt rwt klas draamd ki haay۔ham nay jzaw kay knstrktr main ayktywyt rwt klas anjkshn lghaya haay۔ham nay ayktywytyda raؤt.snap shat.paramp.jyt () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey akhtyary pyramytr aai day tak rsaiy haasal ki hay ، kwnyy rwtngh main akhtyary pyramytrza kay sath pyramytraizada rwt nhaw ko astamal karnay kay liye ، dawylprza akhtyary pyramytr kay sath rastay kay rastay ki wzuahat krsktay hayn: alamt ka astamal karty hawiay: alamt ka astamal karty hayn۔pyramytr ka nam aur is kay bad؟as bat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye alamt keh pyramytr akhtyary hay ، rastay aur kesi bhi dusri khsawsayat kay sath rwt ki trtyb ki wzuahat karain ، aur ayktywytyda rwt srws ka astamal karty hoey jzaw main akhtyary pyramytr tak rsaiy haasal kryn۔

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main urlsegment aur urlsegment ghrwp kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟
Answer: urlsegment yeh kwnyy rwtngh main urlsement klas URL12 kay ayk hi hasaay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ urlsement klas URL tabkat ko tjzayha karnay aur is main jwra twra kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ urlsement klas pyramytrza ko nkalnay aur URL12 sy pyramytrza sy astfsar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔kwnyy rwtngh main yw aar ayl 12 kay anfrady tabkat kay sath kam kryn۔yw aar ayl tabkat 342۔ yw aar ayl syghmnt ghrwp klas mfyd hay jab dawylprza ko URL342.IN khlasaha kay tabkat kay ghrwpwn kay sath kam karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay ، kwnyy rwtngh main URLSEGMENT aur URLSEGMETGROUP klas baltrtyb URL kay hasawn aur tabkat kay anfrady tabkat aur ghrwps ko pars aur jwra twra karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔yw aar ayl syghmnt klas ko yw aar ayl kay anfrady tabkat kay sath kam karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky yw aar ayl syghmnt ghrwp klas ko yw aar ayl kay tabkat kay ghrwpwn kay sath kam karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main rwtr kay wakaat ko snbhalnay kay liye aap rwtr.aywnts.aywns۔ sbskraib () ka tarykha kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer:
rwtr kay wakaat ko kwnyy rwtngh main raؤtr kay wakaat ko snbhalnay kay liay۔wakaat۔ fyltr sirf un lwghwn ko snbhalnay kay liye jo ayplykyshn sy mtalk hayn۔ajzaa} sy '@kwnyy/kwr' ؛ draamd {raؤtr ، nywy ghyshn} sy '@kwnyy/rwtr' sy 'rxjs/aaprytrza' sy draamd {fltr@@jzaw ({slyktr: 'ayp msaal' ، tymplyt: `

raؤtr aywnt: {{wakaha}}

`}) braamdy klas msaal kay tawr par {wakaha: strngh ؛knstrktr (njy rwtr: rwtr) {this.router.events.pipe (fltr (wakaha => aywnt msaal kay tawr par nywyghyshnynda))) sbskraib ((wakaha: nywyghyshnynda) => {this.event = aywnt.wrl ؛}) ؛}} mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hum nay jzaw main @kwnyy/rwtr sy rwtr aur nywyghyshnynda klasza draamd ki hayn۔ham nay RXJs/aaprytrza sy fltr fnkshn draamd kya haay۔ham nay jzaw kay knstrktr main rwtr klas anjkshn lghaya haay۔ham nay rwtr ko sbskraib kya haay۔ rwtr wakaat ko snnay kay liye kabl mshahadha۔ham nay wakaat ko sirf nywy ghyshn aywnt ko snbhalnay kay liye fltr kya haay۔ham nay kal byk byk fnkshn main wakaat ko snbhala haay۔ khlasaha main ، raؤtr rwtngh main rwtr wakaat ko snbhalnay kay liye rwtr۔ aywynts۔ sbskraib () tarykha () ، dawylprza jzaw ya khdmt main @kwnyy/rwtr sy rwtr klas anjykshn krsktay hain ، is ko sbskraib krsktay hayn۔rwtr۔ rwtr wakaat ko snnay kay liye mshahadha karnay waly ، wakaat ko sirf un ko snbhalnay kay liye fltr karain jo ayplykyshn sy mtalk hain ، aur kal byk fnkshn main wakaat ko snbhalyn۔

Question: kwnyy rwtngh main ayktywyt rwt ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer:
kwnyy rwtngh main ayktywytyda rwt۔ pyrnt praprty ka astamal pyrnt rwt syghmnt kay ayktywyt rwt msaal tak rsaiy kay liye kya jata haay۔ayktywytyda rwt kay baray main kuch aham nkat yeh hayn۔ pyrnt praprty: ayktywytda rwt۔ pyrnt praprty @kwnyy/rwtr pykyj 12 main ayktywytyt raؤt klas ki ayk praprty haay۔ ayktywytyda raؤt praprty ko waldyn rwt syghmnt kay ayktywytyt rwt msaal kay tawr par astamal kya jata haay۔. waldyn ki praprty mfyd hay jab dawylprza ko pyrnt rwt syghmnt kay pyramytrza tak rsaiy haasal karnay ya kesi bchay kay ajzaaa sy pyramytrza ko astfsar karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔kwnyy rwtngh myn: draamd {ajzaaa ،@@kwnyy/kwr 'say ONINIT ؛ draamd {ayktywyt rwt} say'@kwnyy/raؤtr 'say@jzaw ({slyktr:' ayp-chlda '، tymplyt: `

waldyn pyramytr: {{pyrntyda}}

`}) braamd klas chailda ajzaaa ko awnt {pyrntyda: strngh ؛knstrktr (njy rwt: ayktywytyda rwt) {} ngoninit () {this.parentid = this.route.parent.snapshot.parammap.get ('id') ؛}} mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hum nay jzaw main @kwnyy/rwtr sy ayktywyt rwt klas draamd ki haay۔ham nay jzaw kay knstrktr main ayktywyt rwt klas anjkshn lghaya haay۔ham nay pyrnt rwt syghmnt kay ayktywytyt rwt msaal kay tawr par ayktywytyt raؤt۔ pyrynt praprty ka astamal karty hoey rsaiy haasal ki haay۔ham nay ayktywytyda raؤt.snap shat.paramp.jyt () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey pyrnt rwt syghmnt kay pyramytr ID tak rsaiy haasal ki haay۔dawylprza pyrnt rwt tabkha kay pyramytrza tak rsaiy haasal karnay ya kesi bchay kay jzaw sy pyramytrza ko astfsar karnay kay liye ayktywytyda rwt۔ pyrnt praprty ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ayktywytyda raؤt۔ pyrnt praprty ko bchay kay jzaw main ayktywytyda rwt srws ka astamal karty hoey rsaiy haasal ki jati haay۔

Question: aap kwnyy rwtngh main astfsar pyrmza aur fryghmnt praprtyza kay sath raؤtr۔ nywyghyt () tarykha kis tarah astamal karty hayn؟
Answer: kwnyy rwtngh main astfsar pyrmza aur fryghmnt praprtyza kay sath raؤtr۔ nywyghyt () tarykha astamal karnay kay liye ، dawylpr un mrahal ki pyrwy krsktay hayn: ajzaaa main @kwnyy/rwtr sy rwtr klas draamd kryn۔raؤtr۔ nywyghyt () tarykha kar kay sath yw aar ayl tabkat ki ayk saf ، astfsar pyrmza ka ayk shay ، aur ayk tkraa۔ astfsar pyramytrza ko snbhalnay kay liye kis tarah kwiyr pyram shyndalngh praprty ka astamal kryn۔kwnyy rwtngh main fryghmnt ki khsawsayat: '@kwnyy/kwr' sy {jzaw} draamd {rwtr@'@kwnyy/rwtr' sy draamd@ajzaaa ({slyktr: 'ayp msaal' ، tymplyt: `<btn (klk)= "gootoexample ()"> msaal kay tawr par </buttain> `}) braamd klas msaal kay tawr par {knstrktr (njy rwtr: rwtr) {} gotoexample () {Const quesparams = {id: '123' ، nam: 'msaal'}؛const tkraa = 'tfsaylat' ؛this.router.navigate (['/msaal'] ، {astfsar pyrmza ، tkraa ، astfsar pyramshyndalngh: 'anzumam'}) ؛}} mzakwrha bala msaal main ، hum nay jzaw main @kwnyy/rwtr sy rwtr klas draamd kya haay۔ham nay jzaw kay knstrktr main rwtr klas anjkshn lghaya haay۔ham nay URL tabkat ki ayk saf ، astfsar pyrmza ka ayk mksad ، aur ayk tkraa kay sath rwtr.nwyghyt () tarykha ko blaya haay۔ham nay astfsar pyramytrza ko mwjwdha astfsar pyramytrza kay sath zum karnay kay liye 'zum' karnay kay liye kwiry pyra mysyndalngh praprty ka tayn kya haay۔@jzaw main kwnyy/rwtr ، jzaw kay knstrktr main rwtr klas anjykshn lghaiyn ، URL tabkat ki ayk saf ، astfsar pyrmza ki ayk chyza ، aur ayk tkraa kay sath raؤtr۔ nywyghyt () kay tarykha kar ko kal karain ، aur wzuahat karnay kay liye astfsar pyram shyndalngh praprty ka astamal kryn۔astfsar pyramytrza ko kis tarah snbhalyn
